ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I once entertained the children, laughed and played with them, sharing mirth with all.
Then Breach came.
It was a beautiful day in the playground when the rockets fell. The flames roasted the children and scattered their limbs and viscera in all directions. I myself was mutilated, scorched beyond recognition, yet I survived.
Breach did more than blacken my outer shell - he cast a darkness over my very soul that day. I am no longer friendly. I am now an agent of pain, darkness, and misery. All will feel the betrayal of hope and happiness. Despair and flame will rule this land!
So I feast on those who enter my lair, stiffening my sinews and gathering power in preparation for the day that he comes. And he will come.
Then, I will have my revenge. Breach will pay.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我曾经逗过孩子们开心，和他们一起欢笑，一起玩耍，与所有人分享快乐。
然后，布瑞奇来了。
火箭坠落时，操场上天气很好。火焰烘烤着孩子们，把他们的四肢和内脏四散开来。我自己也被烧得面目全非，但我活了下来。
布瑞奇不仅使我的外壳变黑，那天他还在我的灵魂上投下一片黑暗。我不再友好了，我现在是黑暗和痛苦的化身。所有人都会感到希望和幸福的背叛，绝望和火焰将统治这片土地!
所以我要吃掉那些闯进我家的人，积蓄力量使我强壮，预备他来的日子。他会来的。
然后，我就可以报仇了，布瑞奇将付出代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caravan Coming
ESP.TRADUIT: 商队来了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bobby,
Caravan is coming in tomorrow. We're gonna hit it at dawn. Should have some ammo and girly mags.
By the way, you were right. The Inventor has laced his pants with dynamite. What the fuck is he thinking? Crazy fuck is good with bombs, but it makes me nervous being around him. Is it true that he's buried C4 all around the cavern? I heard somebody say that, but there's no way boss would let him do that. One accident and we're toast.
Boss wants more meat for his mole rat. Stupid to keep one of those things as a pet. Caravan should set us up for a righteous cookout.
- Jeff
ESP.TRADUIT:
鲍比，
商队明天就到。我们会在黎明到达那里，应该带点弹药和裸女杂志。
顺便说一句，你是对的。发明家在裤子上系上了炸药，他到底在想什么？疯子对炸弹很在行，但和他在一起让我很紧张。他在山洞周围埋了C4炸药是真的吗？我听到有人这么说，但老板不可能让他这么做。只要发生一次事故，我们就完蛋了。
老板想要更多肉给他的鼹鼠，把这种东西当宠物真是太蠢了。商队应该给我们安排一次野外烧烤。
- 杰夫

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Worried
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很担心

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I thought Goodman was a respected scientist and filmmaker, but I'm starting to think he's just crazy.
He's been mumbling about how they left him behind, then starts babbling out names like Dolittle, Breach, Pretzels, and Whistles. He's so angry.
Once this little trip is done I'm going to say adios. This will be good for my resume, but that's it. Maybe I can get on board with [%]!
ESP.TRADUIT:
我以为古德曼是个受人尊敬的科学家和电影制作人，但我开始觉得他疯了。
他一直在嘟囔他们是怎么把他丢在后面的，然后开始念叨一些名字，比如杜立德, 布瑞奇, 椒盐卷饼和口哨。他是如此生气。
这趟旅行一结束，我就跟你说再见。这对我的简历有好处，但仅此而已，也许我可以和[%]合作!

ESP.ORIGINAL: One Last Job
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一份工作

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[%],
This is Wickham. I recently heard about what transpired in Utah, and I want to extend my apologies for Brookshire's actions. What happened was simply criminal. I know you may harbor some well-deserved resentment for the NCR, but I have an offer nonetheless.
We are making final preparations for the battle at Hoover Dam, but there is one matter that could use your attention, and we are willing to pay handsomely. Regardless of what happened with Brookshire, my superiors still appreciate your actions at Canyon Cove. We're planning something similar, though it's potentially much larger in scope. If you're interested, please speak with Ranger Josey at Ranger Station Echo.
Should you elect to turn down this opportunity, I respect your decision. However, I only ask you hear out Josey first.
Sincerely, Wickham.
ESP.TRADUIT:
[%],
这里是维克汉姆。我最近听说了犹他州发生的事，我想为布鲁克郡的行为道歉。他所做的一切简直就是犯罪，我知道你可能会对NCR心怀怨恨，但我还是有个提议。
我们正在为胡佛水坝的战斗做最后的准备，但有一件事需要你的照料，我们愿意慷慨地付钱。不管布鲁克郡那边发生了什么，我的上级还是很欣赏你在峡谷湾的作为。我们也在计划类似的项目，不过规模可能会更大。如果你有兴趣，请和游骑兵驻扎站E的游骑兵乔西谈谈。
如果你决定拒绝这次机会，我尊重你的决定。不过，我希望你能先听乔西说完。
真诚地,
- 维克汉姆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank You
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[%],
On behalf of the Republic, thank you for a job well done. The defense at FOB Omega is going to be immortalized as one of the finest moments in the history of our military, and you made it possible. More importantly, hundreds of slaves are now alive because of the bravery and sacrifice exhibited by the defenders.
Brookshire's actions at Frosthill have now been formally censured, and the agency wishes to extend our gratitude with a formal commendation and appropriate financial compensation.
The New California Republic thanks you for your service, [%].
Sincerely, Wickham.
ESP.TRADUIT:
[%],
我代表共和国，感谢你出色的工作。欧米茄前线作战基地保卫战将成为我们的军队历史上最辉煌的时刻之一，是你让它成为可能。更重要的是，数以百计的奴隶现在还活着，因为他们的英勇和牺牲。
布鲁克希尔在霜山的行为已经受到了正式的谴责，该机构希望通过正式的表扬和适当的经济补偿来表达我们的感激之情。
新加利福尼亚共和国感谢您的服务,[%]。
真诚地,
- 维克汉姆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One Last Job
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一份工作

ESP.ORIGINAL:
[%],
My name is Wickham. I work for a select branch of an unnamed agency of the New California Republic. Lately we've been occupied with preparations for Hoover Dam, but something else has recently come up that may require your unique talents.
I understand you were given a raw deal by Mr. Brookshire in Utah, and I feel this could be a fine way to make amends. If you're willing to meet us in the middle, please speak with Ranger Josey at Ranger Station Echo. He will fill you in on the details of what we're planning.
Should you elect to turn down this opportunity, I respect your decision. However, I only ask you hear out Josey first.
Sincerely, Wickham.
ESP.TRADUIT:
[%],
我叫维克汉姆。我在NCR下属的一个不能透露名字的分支机构工作。最近我们忙于胡佛水坝之战的准备工作，但最近又出现了一些其他的事情，可能需要你的独特才能。
我知道你在犹他州遭受了布鲁克希尔先生的不公平对待，我觉得这是补偿你的好办法。如果你愿意折中和我们会面，请和游骑兵驻扎站E的游骑兵乔西谈谈，他会把我们计划的细节告诉你的。
如果你决定拒绝这次机会，我尊重你的决定。不过，我只希望你能先听乔西说完。
真诚地,
- 维克汉姆，

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, look who just showed up to the party! We kind of missed you back there in Utah, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，看看谁来参加派对了！我们在犹他州的时候有点想你，呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kind of a long, fucked up road here. I heard about what happened, real sad and everything. I really miss that place, especially the fucking snowmen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条路又长又乱。我听说了发生的事，真的很伤心。我真想念那个地方，尤其是那些该死的雪人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well fuck me with a bag of dicks... I did not expect to see you. That was some crazy shit that went down up there, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧我真是艹了...我真没想到会见到你。这太疯狂了，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_GREETING_00009D9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see your hands? No, wait, that's probably rude, I shouldn't ask that... just, uh, forget I said that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你的手吗？不，等等，这可能很粗鲁，我不该问的...就当我没说过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_GREETING_00009D9C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crazy to see you here... God, I just... literally, list of people I expect to see, you're last person on that fucking list. Totally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里见到你真是太疯狂了...上帝，我只是...我最想见的人名单上，你是最后一名，绝对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_GREETING_00009D9C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you want a smoke or... drink or something? You can step down in the foxhole and steadily die from Cutty's farts, if you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你想抽支烟还是...饮料什么的？如果你愿意，你可以走到散兵坑里，让卡蒂的屁把你闷死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_GREETING_00009D9C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you need there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_GREETING_00009D9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now look here, motherfucker, if you're here for some child support, you can just tell that old bitch I'm fucking tapped out, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，听着，混蛋，如果你是来要孩子抚养费的，你就告诉那个老贱人我快没钱了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the fuck are you looking at me like that? You trying to get in my pants, you fucking weirdo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈为什么这样看着我？你想跟我上床吗，你个变态？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，先生？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, ma'am?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，女士？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lieutenant, for the last time, I have no more men to spare! You must make do with what you have!
ESP.TRADUIT: 中尉，我再说最后一次，我没有多余的人手了！你必须将就一下你现有的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He glances up at you. His eyes convey fear and uncertainty.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他抬头看了你一眼，他的眼神流露出恐惧和彷徨。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He is clearly in better spirits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他显然精神好多了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He looks at you with hesitation, though there's a hint of hope in his expression.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他犹豫地看着你，尽管他的表情中有一丝希望。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He smiles and nods gratefully. He is in good spirits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他微笑着，感激地点了点头，看起来精神很好。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you spare an old man some of the good stuff? I'm on my way out, I just want a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我这个老头点好东西吗？我正要出去，我只想喝一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well come on in, have a seat, we'll get... now hold on, is that little Ryan I see with you right there? Holy shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请进，请坐，我们会...等等，我看到和你在一起的是小瑞安吗？天呐！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you? How did you get him back? What's going on here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁？你是怎么把他弄回来的？这是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you, friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做什么，朋友？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, you're the one they call the Courier, aren't you? Could I have a moment of your time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，你就是他们所说的邮差，对吧？我能占用你一点时间吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with the Shady Sands Tribune, and I'll like to interview you, get all the facts straight before we print a story about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是沙荫镇论坛报的记者，我想采访你，在我们报道你之前先弄清楚事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for agreeing to this. First things first, can I get your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你同意这么做。首先，我能知道你的名字吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cutty, did I see you filling out paperwork so that you could take the Corporal's exam? Tell me I'm seeing things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂，我看到你在填表格以便参加下士考试吗？告诉我我看到了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HELLO_0000ACF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cutty, did I tell you I got a letter from my girl, Sarah? I don't know what to think, she says she's got this new friend. I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂，我告诉过你我女朋友莎拉给我写了封信吗？我不知道该怎么想，她说她有了个新朋友。我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HELLO_0000D7B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Prompt Cutty Singing Johnny Guitar}
ESP.TRADUIT: {提示卡蒂唱约翰尼吉他}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, fuck this weather... I'm dying. Why the fuck did we come here? This is your fault, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，该死的天气...我要死了。我们他妈为什么要来这里?这都是你的错，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HELLO_0000DAC8_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 快来抓我，婊子们！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murder
ESP.TRADUIT: 谋杀

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that was beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太美了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, that was nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，太棒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that must've hurt. Shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那一定很痛。 妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, wow, that was good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，哇，那太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nicely done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_MurderNoCrime_0000DB07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't have done better myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己也不能做得更好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮的击杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confirmed kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确认击杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking A, that was nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的A，太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoo, that was a good one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，真是个好主意！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good shot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好枪法！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rolled him up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 压制他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not bad right there. Keep it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里不错，坚持下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoo! He didn't see that coming!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！他没想到会这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, now that's some good shooting right there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你的枪法真棒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that was nice. Well done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那很好，做得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hell yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Death sound}
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡的声音}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_Death_0000DAE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Death sound}
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡的声音}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_Death_0000DAFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Death Sound}
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡的声音}

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Death Sound}
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡的声音}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Death Sound}
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡的声音}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it hurts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好痛！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm bleeding out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我流血了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not feeling good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉不太好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm about to black out, buddy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我要昏过去了，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh, I'm hurt bad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我受了重伤！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HealthQuarter_0000DAFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this is it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，就是这个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HealthQuarter_0000DAFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit, I'm gonna die in this shithole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我要死在这鬼地方了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HealthQuarter_0000DAFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fuck me, I'm dying!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，我要死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HealthQuarter_0000DB00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't stop the bleeding!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我止不住血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_HealthQuarter_0000DB01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03000DBA] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [03000DBA] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯唔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Show Letter> Wickham told me to speak with you about a job.
ESP.TRADUIT: <展示信>维克汉姆让我跟你谈谈工作的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wickham sent you, huh? Wonder what he's up to... probably sitting in there, banging fucking secretaries, two at a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维克汉姆派你来的，哈？不知道他在干什么...可能是坐在那里，和秘书们乱搞，一次两个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be nice... sitting in the air conditioned office all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定很爽...整天坐在有空调的办公室里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the deal: big uprising over in Arizona there. Bunch of slaves, it was a fucking mess, half of them got killed... disaster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情是这样的，亚利桑那州发生了大起义。一群奴隶，真是他妈的一团糟，一半被杀了...灾难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big bunch of them might be coming over to our side, south of Bullhead. We gotta go down to this place near the river. What's it called, Watson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能会有一大群人站在我们这边，在布尔海德以南。我们得去河边的一个地方。叫什么来着，沃森？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, it's a shithole. We going down to Camp Shithole. You gonna help square things away there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，那是个鬼地方。我们要去那个鬼地方的营地。你得帮我解决问题...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cause apparently you're some kind of fixer type, I don't even know what the fuck that means. That's what Wickham said. "We're gonna get a fixer."
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为很明显你是某种能收拾局面的人，我甚至不知道那他妈的是什么意思。维克汉姆也是这么说的：“我们要找个中间人。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and Watson, here - we're gonna go reconnoiter, figure out if them slaves are gonna cross over, we gonna bring 'em back...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和沃森，我们去侦察一下，看看奴隶们会不会越界，然后把他们带回来...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if the Legion is gonna cause some trouble there, we gonna have to hold the line there at Camp Shithole. Can you handle that kind of thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团要在那里制造麻烦，我们就得在这个屎坑营地守住防线。你能处理这种事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyIntroExp_0000301E_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I bring my companions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以带同伴来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now why you gotta go on bringing all that mess with you? I don't see the need in that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么还要带着这些麻烦？我觉得没必要这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't tell me one way or the other. You know what it's like for me? They say, "Hey, you - do this shit." And I gotta say, "Yes, sir."
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何方法他们都没告诉我。你知道我是什么感觉吗？他们说:“嘿，你--去干这个。”我得说：“是，长官。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what... you bring that whole freakshow with you. I don't give a fuck anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你什么...你把整个怪胎秀都带来了，我他妈都不在乎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCompanio_0000331B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Top crawls up my ass, I'll tell him he can fucking eat my dick. No Watson, you shut the fuck up, that's exactly what I'm gonna tell him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果托普爬上我的屁股，我会告诉他，他可以吃我的鸡巴。不，沃森，你他妈闭嘴，这正是我要告诉他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCompanio_0000331B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的时间考虑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine. In the meantime, I'm gonna go jerk off here in the shitter. It's hotter than fucking hell. I hope I don't pass out. I'll be right back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那很好。与此同时，我要在这个鬼地方打飞机。比他妈的地狱还热，我希望我不会昏过去。我马上回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyMoreTime_00003337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely. Count me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对的，算我一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get this show on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们这就开始吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I was kind of a hellraiser when I was young, like Joaquin, my cousin. It was enlistment... or jail, so I signed up. That's all there is to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我年轻的时候也是个恶作剧之王，跟我表哥杰昆一样。只能入伍......或者进监狱，所以我报名参军了，这就是全部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up in the military?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么进军队的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'd gone infantry, so I figured I was already at maximum suck doing that, so what the fuck did I have to lose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我当了步兵，所以我想我已经很糟糕了，所以我他妈还能有什么损失？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out the barrel of suck goes a hell of a lot lower than I figured. Example: standing in this shithole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来这桶烂酒比我想象的还要烂。比如：站在这个鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why'd you become a ranger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要当游骑兵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been in over fifty engagements. Shot, speared, stabbed... I'm still standing here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经参加了五十多次战斗了。射击、矛刺、刀捅...我仍然站在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last place was Firebase Zulu. Oh, that was a nice little piece of hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一个地方是祖鲁火力点，噢，那是一段美好的地狱之旅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen much action?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你参与过很多行动吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the Legion came with, I don't know, about a thousand men. We were up on this hill there. There was a lot of artillery, and... it was bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，军团来的时候，大概有一千人。我们在山上，有很多大炮，还有...它是坏的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the end, we just kind of held them off there. Lost a lot of good men, but... that's how it goes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，我们只是阻止了他们。失去了很多好男人，但是...事情就是这样发展的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worst part of it is that we're giving the fucking thing up now. Damn silver mines dried up, politicians say it ain't worth dying over no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最糟糕的是我们现在要放弃这些该死的东西了，该死的银矿干涸了，政客们说不值得再为它而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I think that's what they call a pubic victory. You know, it's kind of like where you have sex with this skank you don't like...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这就是所谓的公众胜利。你知道，这有点像你和一个你不喜欢的荡妇做爱...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you getting her, but then she gives you crabs, you find them a few days later. Kind of like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以为你得到了她，但她给了你性病，几天后你就发现了。有点像那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, you asking me questions, I'm gonna ask you one. What was all that business up there in Utah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的，你问我问题，我也得问你一个。犹他州那边到底是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard you got shot up, town got killed, bunch of other mess. What really happened up there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你中枪了，小镇被屠了，剩下一堆烂摊子。到底发生了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened at Firebase Zulu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 祖鲁火力点发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see him fight the Legion once, you won't have any doubts. He hates them worse than anybody I know, with good reason, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看他和军团战斗一次，就不会有任何怀疑了。他比我认识的任何人都恨他们，而且有充分的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know that Watson used to fight for Caesar's Legion, right? How do you trust him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道沃森以前为凯撒军团效力吧？你怎么能相信他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to get to know you. What's your background?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很想了解你，你的背景是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get. Fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快。滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess we got started off on the wrong foot. I just want to know the guy fighting alongside me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们一开始走错了路，我只想知道和我并肩作战的人是谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get. Fucked. Hey, you're right. That helps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快。滚。嘿，你说的对，这很有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you're experiencing a lot of stress. It can help to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你现在压力很大，说说话会有帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little town called Getfuckedville.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫"快滚"的小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, you've made your point. Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你已经表明了你的观点。你从哪里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Father was Get. Mother was Fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 父亲是快，母亲是滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who were your parents?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的父母是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never had one, was an orphan. Raised by Legion. Fought as Centurion. Abandoned at divide as ghoul. Joined NCR. Now I'm a ranger. Now get fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从来没有过，是个孤儿，由军团抚养，作为百夫长战斗。变成尸鬼被遗弃在分水岭，加入NCR，现在我是一名游骑兵。现在快滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just insulted your own mother. What's wrong with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚刚侮辱了自己的母亲，你怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you were part of Caesar's Legion? Does Josey know this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你是凯撒军团的一员?乔西知道吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel good. Fuckers left me for dead. I'll kill them all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉很好，那些混蛋丢下我等死。我要把他们都杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about fighting your former comrades?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对和以前的战友作战有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I personally decapitate Titus Atticus, you'll know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我亲自把提图斯·阿提库斯斩首，你就知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I be certain of your allegiance to NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么能确定你对NCR的忠诚？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a cunt. He fights well, but he's mainly a cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个婊子，他打得不错，但他还是个婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know Titus Atticus? What can you tell me about him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识提图斯·阿提库斯吗?你能跟我说说他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's good with guns or the blade. He likes to torture slaves for hours. He's a fucking psychopath. That good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很会用枪和刀刃，他喜欢折磨奴隶几个小时，他就是个变态。好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No other details about our adversary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有关于我们对手的其他细节了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the ones that asked a lot of stupid questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有那些问了很多愚蠢问题的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you ever torture slaves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你折磨过奴隶吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever hear what happened to Glanton in your travels?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过格兰顿在你的旅途中遭遇了什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah, the old scalp-hunter motherfucker. Yeah, he walked his ass down to Mexico, tried to scalp this old boy, old, what the fuck is his name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，那个该死的老头皮猎人。是啊，他跑到墨西哥，想剥这个老家伙的头皮，老，他叫什么名字来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyGlanton_00009D93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck, I can't speak that shit, old Cam-odor, or whatever the fuck, he, he...
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我怎么说不出来，老卡姆...多尔，或者随便什么，他，他...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyGlanton_00009D93_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton got close enough to kill him, cut him up, but, yeah, they got a hold of him...
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿离他很近，差点杀了他，把他切碎，但是，是的，他们抓住了他...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyGlanton_00009D93_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ended up kind of funny... they scalped Glanton and then barbecued his ass like a marshmallow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果有点好笑...他们剥了格兰顿的头皮，然后像烤棉花糖一样烤他的屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyGlanton_00009D93_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I hear, Old Quemador got infection, died not long after, so... there you go, everybody dies, happy ending and all that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说老奎玛多感染了不久就死了所以...好了，大家都死了，皆大欢喜之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyGlanton_00009D93_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you have some interesting stories from your time as a Ranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你当游骑兵的时候一定有一些有趣的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got that right. Been all over, from Baja all the way and back. What you want to know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，从巴哈一路回来，到处都有。你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, what you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to hear another story, if you've got the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有时间的话，我想再听一个故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of payment can I expect?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能得到什么样的报酬？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can expect... whatever the fuck the brass is gonna give you, cause they don't tell me shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以期待......不管上级会给你什么，因为他们什么都不告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just as I suspected, it's a shithole. You go on up, talk to the CO there, get it squared away. We gonna cross the river, find them slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我所料，这是个鬼地方。你去跟那边的指挥官谈谈，把事情搞定。我们要过河，找到那些奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyGreetAft_000036CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you when I see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后会有期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyArrivalY_000036D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance I can go with you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能和你一起去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a big fat no right there, partner. This is secret squirrel and all that, we got to be stealthy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可是个大错误，伙计。这是松鼠密探之类的，我们得偷偷摸摸...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyArrivalG_000036D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a lot of work to have to explain the map, and where we're going, and set all that up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 解释这张地图，我们要去哪里，以及设置所有这些都需要做很多工作...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyArrivalG_000036D3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to do all that mess. We gonna keep it simple, okay, partner? You just stay put.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想弄得一团糟。我们就简单点，好吗，伙计?你待着别动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyArrivalG_000036D3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm [%]. Wickham hired me to help out around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是 [%].维克汉姆雇我来帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Forward Operating Base Omega. I'm Lieutenant Hodges. We're gonna get you to work right away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到欧米伽前线作战基地，我是霍奇斯中尉。我们马上送你去工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm unsure what Ranger Josey has told you, but the situation here is... not ideal. We are undermanned, as you can see, and we are undersupplied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道游骑兵乔西跟你说了什么，但现在的情况是...不是最理想的。如你所见，我们人手不足，补给不足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If our intelligence is right, however, in the next couple of days this little spot could be very important to the brass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，如果我们的情报是正确的，在接下来的几天里这个小地点可能对高层非常重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before all that happens, though, we're gonna have to do a few things around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在这一切发生之前，我们得做几件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right now the only medical treatment we can offer our soldiers is improvised first aid. None of us are experienced medics, much less doctors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们能给士兵提供的唯一治疗是临时急救。我们都不是经验丰富的医务人员，更不用说医生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I requested a doctor, and the brass sent me a robot. Unfortunately, damn thing is broken down and it's sitting in a bunker over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我请了医生，上级给了我一个机器人。不幸的是，这该死的东西坏了，放在那边的地堡里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other hand, we have a derelict sentry bot, that might be put back into action if you have the skill to repair it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，我们有一个被遗弃的哨兵机器人，如果你有修复它的技能，它可能会被重新投入使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, time is limited, so you're probably gonna have to choose one or the other. It's not gonna be a quick fix either way. I'll leave it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，时间有限，所以你可能不得不选择其中之一。无论如何，这都不是能快速解决的办法，我把它留给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a relief. Good to know we have that thing out there guarding us now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我松了一口气，很高兴知道有那东西在外面保护我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got something for you right now. Adjacent to the ravine is a place called Chard Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有些事要给你，与溪谷相邻的是一个叫查德峡谷的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's one of our main supply routes. Unfortunately, our supply caravan hasn't checked in on time, and I'd like for you to go investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们的主要补给路线之一。不幸的是，我们的补给车队没有按时报到，我希望你能去调查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They probably just got drunk and they're held back somewhere, but just in case, I want you to check it out. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能只是喝醉了，藏起来了，但以防万一，我想让你去看看。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I repaired the sentry bot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我修好了哨兵机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's good news. We're gonna need the first aid if the Legion comes knocking here. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好消息。如果军团来敲门，我们需要急救，谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got something for you right now. Adjacent to the ravine is a place called Chard Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有些事要给你，与溪谷相邻的是一个叫查德峡谷的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's one of our main supply routes. Unfortunately, our supply caravan hasn't checked in on time, and I'd like for you to go investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们的主要补给路线之一。不幸的是，我们的补给车队没有按时报到，我希望你能去调查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They probably just got drunk and they're held back somewhere, but just in case, I want you to check it out. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能只是喝醉了，藏起来了，但以防万一，我想让你去看看。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I repaired the medical bot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我修好了医疗机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well, I'm impressed. That's great, really! Um, by the way, Josey wants to talk with you. There's a situation with the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?好吧,给我留下了深刻的印象。太好了,真的！对了，乔西想和你谈谈，奴隶们有情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I convinced Major Spears to dispatch reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服了斯皮尔斯少校派援军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Ghosts? I thought we wiped them out in Bullhead. Anyway, good on you for seeing things through and recovering the supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幽灵帮吗?我以为我们在布尔海德把他们消灭了。不管怎样，很高兴你能把事情办好，把补给找回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel free to take a breather. If you need to rest, there are plenty of spare beds in the barracks. Speak with me when you're ready for the next gig.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以自由地休息一下。如果你需要休息，营房里有足够的床位，等你准备好下一份工作了再来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recovered the missing supplies from a group of raiders called "The Ghosts".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从一群叫做"幽灵"的掠夺者那里找到了丢失的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had been educated by the Followers as a child, and... became a teacher. Enjoyed it. Loved History. Still love it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从小就受到天启追随者的教育，而且...成为了一名教师。蛮喜欢的，喜欢历史，现在仍然爱它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what drove me to sign up, but I did, and... with my background, they gave me a commission. And that, as they say, is how I got here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道是什么驱使我参军的，但我报名了，而且...根据我的背景，他们给了我一笔佣金。正如他们所说，我就是这样来到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a relationship with an enlisted woman at my last duty station. Something of a scandal... so I was told I could either resign...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在上一个工作地点和一个女兵有过一段关系。有点像丑闻...所以我被告知要么辞职...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or... accept a transfer to this illustrious station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者...接受调职到这个著名的驻扎站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but how did you end up *here*. This is the ass-end of nowhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，但你怎么会在这里。这是一个无底洞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outside of the odd Legion Explorer who snipes at us, or a really hungry band of geckos, no, it's very quiet here. We just watch the trade routes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了狙击我们的奇怪的军团探险者，或者一群饥饿的蜥蜴，没有，这里非常安静。我们只是观察贸易路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has FOB Omega been attacked before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欧米伽前线作战基地以前被攻击过吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it keeps up like this, absolutely not. I don't have any desire to spend the next twenty years babysitting the dregs of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一直这样下去，绝对不行。我可不想在接下来的二十年里照看NCR的渣滓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you plan on making a career of the military?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算以当兵为职业生涯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned another job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到了另一份工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a little time before the rangers get back, and if there is gonna be trouble, I'd like to use that time training these troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在游骑兵回来之前我们还有点时间，如果有什么麻烦，我想利用这段时间训练这些部队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them are conscripts with just rudimentary training. If what I've heard is true, you know quite a bit about fighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们大多数都是刚接受过基本训练的义务兵。如果我听说的是真的，那你对战斗还挺在行的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'd like to pass some that on to these grunts, if you're willing. But once again, the issue is time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意的话，我希望你教这些士兵一点。但还是那个问题，问题是时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you're the one doing the teaching, I'm going to defer to your judgment on this. What would you like to emphasize?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你是教课的人，我就听从你的意见了。你想着重哪方面？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, I don't know if there's anything left to be done. I've contacted Major Spears repeatedly and harangued him for reinforcements...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，我不知道还有什么可做的。我已经多次联系斯皮尔斯少校，向他请求增援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spears is in Bullhead. He doesn't appreciate how dire the situation is. Maybe you could convey that to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯皮尔斯在布尔海德。他不知道情况有多糟，也许你可以告诉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do to help with getting reinforcements?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做些什么来帮助得到增援呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's focus on utilizing explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们专注于炸药的使用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That works for me. I'll go ahead and get them formed up, we'll start with the instruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我很有效。我先把他们安排好，我们从指令开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, Ranger Josey radioed in - he'll be here shortly. Feel free to check in with him once we're done with training.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一下，游骑兵乔西用无线电联系了，他马上就到。训练结束后，你可以随时和他联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: An infantryman's highest priority should be marksmanship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 步兵的首要任务应该是枪法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That works for me. I'll go ahead and get them formed up, we'll start with the instruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我很有效。我先把他们安排好，我们从指令开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, Ranger Josey radioed in - he'll be here shortly. Feel free to check in with him once we're done with training.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一下，游骑兵乔西用无线电联系了，他马上就到。训练结束后，你可以随时和他联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion likes to fight up close. Let's make sure these troopers are ready for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团喜欢近距离作战。让我们确保这些士兵做好了准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That works for me. I'll go ahead and get them formed up, we'll start with the instruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我很有效。我先把他们安排好，我们从指令开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, Ranger Josey radioed in - he'll be here shortly. Feel free to check in with him once we're done with training.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一下，游骑兵乔西用无线电联系了，他马上就到。训练结束后，你可以随时和他联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I'm qualified to teach these troopers anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我没资格教这些士兵任何东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. You in the habit of not doing your job? You know what? Take a smoke break until Ranger Josey comes back. Do whatever you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。你有不工作时的习惯吗?你知道吗?在游骑兵乔西回来之前抽根烟休息一下。做你想做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a big group of 'em, they coming across the river in droves, mostly women and children. That's all that's left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一大群人，成群结队地从河那边过来，大多是妇女和儿童。这就是剩下的全部了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003A24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The men mostly died off fighting in this big old battle there. Fellah by the name of Titus Atticus apparently stomped the living shit out of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这场古老的大战中，大部分人都战死了。一个叫提图斯·阿提库斯的家伙把他们活活踩死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003A24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worst thing about all this is... big old Legion army is chasing them as they come this way. They're just killing every slave they see. It's ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最糟糕的是...当他们朝这边来的时候，庞大的老军团正在追赶他们。他们把看到的奴隶都杀了，真丑恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003A24_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gonna get bad here. I don't think Lieutenant Hodges there appreciates just how serious this is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里会变得很糟糕的，我觉得霍奇斯中尉不知道这事有多严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003A24_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I don't know nothing about them funny Legion units, but if we were going by our sizes, I'd say there's about a battalion bearing down on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对那些有趣的军团部队一无所知，但如果按我们的规模来算，我敢说有一个营的人正在向我们逼近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003A24_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What we gotta do is get these troopers squared away. Also, see if we can get some of these slaves to fight for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要做的是让这些士兵做好准备。还有，看看能不能让这些奴隶为我们战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003A24_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened with the slaves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶们怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and Watson will see to the slaves. You need to talk to the CO about wrangling up some reinforcements... so get on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和沃森去照看奴隶。你需要和指挥官谈谈，争取一些增援。那就开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003A28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need me to do right now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We still got a few slaves coming over, but most them is over in the cave there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有几个奴隶过来了，但大部分都在山洞里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003D75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, there's a few of them look fighting age, and... since they already been rebels, some of them know how to fight a little bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，他们中有些人看起来到了能战斗的年龄，而且...因为他们已经是叛军了，他们中的一些人知道如何战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003D75_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to see if we can put them to use, but then again, they've been through a lot. I ain't exactly too sure about how to proceed on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看我们能不能把他们用起来，但话说回来，他们经历了很多。我不太确定该怎么处理这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003D75_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanted to speak with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想和我说话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on to your dicks, everybody. It's about to get hairy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抓住你的鸡巴，大家。快要长毛了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_00003D90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to make final preparations for the battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算为这场战斗做最后的准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, that's good news. Something else come up - big bunch of slaves hollering, making a ruckus over there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这是个好消息。这时又发生了一些事...一大群奴隶在那里大喊大叫，制造骚乱......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000055DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, one old gal got herself knocked up, she's falling over, about to have that baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很显然，一个老女人把自己的肚子搞大了，她快要摔倒了，就要生孩子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000055DC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better go on over, try to pop that thing out, cause God knows I ain't no doctor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好过去，把那玩意弄出来，因为上帝知道我不是医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000055DC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've done everything I can for the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经为奴隶们做了我能做的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at you, delivering babies and saving people left and right. We just gonna have to put some wings on you, let you fly up to heaven, ain't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你，接生，救人。我们只需要给你戴上翅膀，让你飞上天堂，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000058CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you ascend to sainthood, we got one other matter that'll take your mind off of that real quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你升为圣徒之前，我们还有一件事可以让你很快忘掉这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000058CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big group of Cazadors been stinging and killing the slaves coming over. Go over and kill them old bug things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一大群猎蜂一直在杀死前来的奴隶，去解决那些老虫子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000058CF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a real pain in the ass, you know. Just shoot 'em, smash 'em, usual kind of bullshit. Don't get stung or you fucking die. That's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们真的很讨厌，你懂的。射它们，砸它们，就像平常一样。别被蜇了，不然你就死定了，就这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000058CF_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I helped the slave deliver her baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我帮那个奴隶接生了她的孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's damn good. Nobody likes them damn devil bugs. We've got a little bit before Legion comes on in, so get your shit together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可太棒了，没人喜欢这些该死的臭虫。军团来之前我们还有点事，所以你得帮我收拾好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000058E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Final steps and all that... take a shit, jerk off, whatever you gotta do. Let me know when you ready to get dug in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的步骤...拉屎，打飞机等等，随便你怎么做。准备好了就告诉我一声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000058E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want, you can have a little chat with old butter bars over there or anybody else, give 'em a little pep talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意，你可以跟那边的老黄油棒或者其他人聊聊，给他们打打气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_000058E0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I destroyed the Cazadors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我摧毁了猎蜂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking hell! Never thought I'd say this, but that was almost as bad as Zulu. Sonofabitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的地狱！从没想过我会这么说，但这简直和祖鲁一样糟糕，狗娘养的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stupid bastard just pissed his whole army away here... shit fire, brass is gonna eat this up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个愚蠢的杂种把他的军队都给惹毛了...见鬼，高层会把它吃掉的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gotta care for the wounded and police up the dead. I'll have the slaves help out, carry the bodies down to Bullhead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得照顾伤员，把死者交给警察处理。我会让奴隶们帮忙，把尸体搬到布尔海德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One thing, though. That little slave there, Ryan - turns out he's got some kin up there in Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一件事。那个小奴隶，瑞安，原来他在莫哈维有亲戚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like for you to take him up there, and don't give me any shit about it! Just one more thing to check off your little fucking list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你把他带上去，别车上我！你的清单上还有一件事要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For what it's worth, you did damn good here. I don't know if we'd have held this thing without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，你做得很好。我不知道没有你我们还能不能撑下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see them slaves again, you just remember they're alive because of what you done here. Don't forget that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再见到奴隶，只要记住他们还活着就是因为你，不要忘记这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, let's get to the worst part of this... figuring out who's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我们来谈谈最糟糕的部分...弄清楚谁死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0C9_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Titus Atticus is dead. I think we're in the clear now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提图斯·阿提库斯死了，我想我们现在没事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready when you are. Me and the slaves will head to Bullhead, you can go on back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你准备好，我带奴隶们去布尔海德，你可以回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyCurrentM_0000A0CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备回家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the most dangerous person you've met?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过的最危险的人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't scare easy, but I'll admit there was one fellah who made me nervous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不容易被吓到，但我承认有一个家伙让我紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was some kind of Doctor. Doctor Duluth? Dalliance? It made no goddamn sense, cause he wasn't like any doctor I ever met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是某种医生，医生德卢斯吗？调情？这根本说不通，因为他跟我遇到的任何医生都不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a bit under the influence when I saw this guy near Goodsprings, so some of the details might be... hazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在清泉镇附近见到他的时候有点醉了，所以一些细节可能是...朦胧的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, this guy was pale, with a big mustache and a crazy glint in his eyes. Wore a duster and a bigass cowboy hat like some kind of brahmin hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，这个人脸色苍白，留着大胡子，眼睛里闪着疯狂的光芒。戴着抹布，戴着大牛仔帽，像个婆罗门猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was weird was his crew - a zombie, a deathclaw, a robot, and some psycho kid. To top it off, there was a radroach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的是他的成员...一个僵尸，一头死亡爪，一个机器人，还有一个精神失常的孩子。更糟的是，还有一只蟑螂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you might be saying, "This simple motherfucker was high - seeing things." I only had two hits of Jet that day - I know what I saw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你可能会说，“很简单这个狗日的混蛋磕嗨了。”那天我只用了两个杰特，我知道我看到了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The doctor said he was looking for somebody named Ronald... Dickinher? Uh... Dillinger, that's it. Asked if I could help them track him down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生说他在找一个人，叫罗纳德...狄金纳吗？嗯...狄林杰，就是这样，问我能不能帮他们找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't really occupied, so I said okay. Wrong fucking choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当时没什么事，所以就答应了。这他妈该死的错误选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We wander around for a bit... sort of aimlessly. He started singing about goot in a boot... if he wasn't singing, he was talking to the deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们四处闲逛了一会儿...有点漫无目的。他开始唱《靴子里的傻瓜》...如果他不是在唱歌，他就是在和死亡爪说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, we rolled up on some raiders, and that crew of his was mopping them up before I got my gun out of the holster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我们遇到了一些掠夺者，在我把枪从枪套里拿出来之前，他的那伙人开始扫射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What scared me... was how he just kept singing, even when he was shooting. On top of it all, he blew all their heads off... after they were dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 吓了我一跳...就是他一直唱歌，甚至在开枪的时候。最重要的是，他把他们的头都打飞了......在他们死后！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: There he was, singing like a mad hatter, covered in brains and blood, and he breaks out goo goo bars!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就在那里，唱得像个神经病帽匠，浑身是血和脑浆，还发出咕咕咕咕的叫声！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I politely refused, and while his crew was chowing down I made my exit. As I slipped away, I could still hear him singing... it... haunts my dreams.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我礼貌地拒绝了，当他的成员们狼吞虎咽的时候，我离开了。当我悄悄离开时，我还能听到他在唱歌...它...萦绕在我的梦中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you ever serve with Craig Boone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和克雷格·布恩共事过吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I met that asshole. Serious as a serial killer. We shared a barracks for a stretch back in '79.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我见过那个混蛋，像连环杀手一样严肃。79年我们曾在一个营房住过一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was tight quarters, so we had to get pretty familiar with each other. He spent most of his time scowling and cleaning his rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 房间很窄，所以我们必须非常熟悉彼此。他大部分时间都在愁眉苦脸地清洗他的步枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day he got all pissed off when he found me jerking off in his rack. I said I wasn't moving, and he pulled a fucking piece on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一天他发现我在他的床上打飞机，非常生气。我说我不动了，他就朝我开了枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there I was, cock in hand, with Boone pointing that barrel right at my dome. That was a dilemma - blue balls or a bullet in the brain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在那，手里拿着老二，布恩用枪管指着我的头顶。这是一个两难的选择，要么蓝蛋，要么是脑袋里的子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motherfucker tried to bulldog me... stare me down... so I unloaded like a true ranger... all over his blue sleeping bag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这混蛋想逼我...盯着我...所以我像一个真正的游骑兵一样喷射...在他蓝色的睡袋上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing like rubbing one out with a loaded gun aimed at your face. It was quite a thrill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比用上膛的枪对着你的脸时来一发更棒的了，这真是令人兴奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried to get a hooker to duplicate the scene... you know, as a fetish. But she shot herself in the foot. Oh, well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，作为一个恋物癖，我想找个妓女来复制这个场景。但她射中了自己的脚，哦，好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I got some kinfolk in the service. Cousin by the name of Joaquin. He sits on his ass in Boulder City... supposed to be hunting bounties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我有亲戚在服役。他叫杰昆，他坐在巨石城...应该是去猎赏金的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's about useless, just like the rest of them bounty hunters. Fucking stupidest job I've ever heard of, believe you me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他跟其他赏金猎人一样没用。这是我听过的最蠢的工作，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Job description: Will your boot fit up the ass of a hobo? How about a really mean retard on chems? Yeah? Hired, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作描述：你的靴子适合流浪汉的屁股吗？来个嗑药的弱智怎么样？是吗？被录用了，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So yeah, Joaquin chases down bounties and... well, there was Uncle Billy. He got discharged after fucking a supermutant. We don't talk about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以杰昆在追赏金，嗯。还有比利叔叔，他和一个超级变种人上床后被开除了。我们不谈论他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any relatives in the military?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在军队里有亲戚吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've met plenty of freaks... though one does stand out. I was down in a bar... might have been Nipton - I don't remember much from that night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我遇到过很多怪胎......虽然有一个很突出。我在酒吧...可能是尼普顿...那天晚上的事我记不太清楚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was drinking and talking to some girl... when this guy strolls in... with a gas mask and crazy hair. Called himself You-scabies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一边喝酒一边和一个女孩聊天...当时这个人走进来...戴着防毒面具，头发乱蓬蓬的。说自己叫“油腻西施”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that mask and outfit, I assumed he was a migrant worker. Anyway, he eased up to the bar, with a look like someone just shit in his hat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看他的面具和衣服，我以为他是个移民工人。不管怎样，他慢慢地向吧台走去，一副有人在他帽子里拉屎的样子。
