ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He talked like there was a cock stuck in his throat.Took him ten minutes to order a fucking beer, and I was getting thirsty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说起话来就像喉咙里塞了根鸡巴。他花了十分钟才点了一瓶啤酒，我也渴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I politely asked him to hurry his ass up. He said, "Courier... slow... drink... blood... bull... bear."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我礼貌地请他快点。他说，“邮差...慢...喝...血...牛...熊。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said, "Bitch, are you on chems?" He started getting pissy, repeating, "Package... divide... package... divide."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说"贱人，你嗑药了吗？"他开始不耐烦地重复着：“包裹...分水岭...包裹...大裂谷。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told him if his package got near my divide I'd cut his motherfucking throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他，如果他的包裹靠近我的地盘，我就割了他的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So he says, "Step... outside?" I was happy to oblige him. Ain't a full night on the town if you ain't bloodied your knuckles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他说，“走...外面？”我很乐意帮他的忙。如果你不把指关节弄得血淋淋的，你就没法在城里待上一整晚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This wasn't my first rodeo. I had some brass knuckles in my pocket, and I wasn't sure what to expect from this clown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我第一次参加牛仔竞技。我口袋里有一些铜指虎，我不知道从这个小丑那里能得到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_00009DA0_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There I was, ready to go... and he produced a flag pole! I didn't know if I was supposed to fight or pledge allegiance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在那儿，准备出发了...他拿出了一根旗杆！我不知道我是该战斗还是宣誓效忠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I started laughing, and so did everyone else. Then I blacked out from the booze. Knew I should've eaten something beforehand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始大笑，其他人也都笑了。然后我就醉倒了，我就知道我应该事先吃点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You-Scabies... preachiest asshole I ever met. Wouldn't shut the fuck up about getting shafted by some mailman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 油腻西施...我所见过的最爱说教的混蛋，老是说自己被什么邮差骗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well boo-fucking-hoo, bitch. I had a Night stalker bite one of my nipples off, and you don't hear me whine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的嘘嘘，婊子。我让一个夜枭咬掉了我的一个乳头，你听不到我的哀嚎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once saw a guy get stung in the balls by a Cazador. Even that poor bastard didn't complain like You-Scabies. Fucking pussy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经见过一个男人被猎蜂的蛋蛋蛰了，就连那个可怜的混蛋也不像油腻西施那样抱怨，操他妈的婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you're retarded, crippled, or your cock doesn't work, shut the fuck up. If you can't tow the line, just get drunk. There's your philosophy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你是弱智，残废，或者你的鸡巴不起作用，否则就他妈的闭嘴。如果你坚持不了，就喝个烂醉，这就是你的哲学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the strangest person you've encountered in your travels?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在旅行中遇到的最奇怪的人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I was "On assignment" there a while back, conducting a reconnaissance mission on the local poon-tang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，不久前我在那里“执行任务”，在本地妓女那里执行侦察任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, being neck-deep in leased pussy has some drawbacks. Like Gonorrhea. Felt like someone put a blowtorch in my dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟租来的屄在一起也有缺点，比如淋病。感觉就像有人往我老二里插了个喷灯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I stopped in at that Mormon Fort, where those hippie doctors give free treatment. Sure enough, they set me up with some antibiotics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我去了旧摩门要塞，那里的嬉皮士医生提供免费治疗。果然，他们给我开了些抗生素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just never expected them to be so whiny and preachy... some cross-eyed twat tried to lecture me about alcoholism, then wanted a donation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是从没想过他们会这么爱发牢骚，这么爱说教。有个斗鸡眼的混蛋想教我酗酒，然后想要捐款。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a little... under the influence, so I interpreted "Donate" as "Grab my tits."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一点...所以我把"捐赠"理解为"抓住我的奶子"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She got all jumped-up and started hollering... so I made another donation and then pissed on their sign, even though it burned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她激动起来，开始大喊大叫。所以我又捐了一笔钱，然后在他们的牌子上撒尿，尽管牌子被烧了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever been to Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 去过自由城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep. I made the mistake of walking into the Ultra-Luxe. I heard someone say it was glamorous, so I thought they'd have tits on full display.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我犯了个错误，走进了奢华殿堂。我听有人说那很迷人，所以我以为那里的人会把奶子露出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing glamorous about it, believe me. That didn't stop me from getting shit-faced, though. Place was much more interesting after a few shots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，这一点也不迷人，但我还是喝得烂醉如泥。拍了几张照片之后，这个地方就有趣多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I'm minding my own business, and some mime with a clown mask tells me I'm dressed inappropriately, and they frown on public intoxication.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只顾着自己的事，某个戴着小丑面具的哑剧演员说我穿得不得体，他们不赞成在公共场合醉酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sort of blacked out, but somebody who was there said I took that mask and applied to my genital area while screaming, "I'm President Kimball!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点晕过去了，但当时在场的一个人说我拿起那个面具，把它贴在我的生殖器上，并尖叫着，“我是金博尔总统！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that description is exaggerated. He also said that I took a mean shit in their fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为这种描述有些夸张，他还说我在他们的喷泉里拉屎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently that's why I'm banned from the Ultra-Luxe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很显然这就是为什么我被禁止进入奢华殿堂的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRandomSt_0000A0C8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever been to the strip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过长街吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you met Russell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过拉塞尔吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I know old Cyclops there from way back in the Desert Rangers. He's kind of a hardass...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我认识一个很久以前在沙漠游骑兵服役的独眼。他是个硬汉...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRussell_00009D96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I see you giving me the stink-eye... singular, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我看到你对我冷眼相看了...很明显，草泥马。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRussell_00009D96_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea about the Legion's strategy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道军团的策略吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They gonna come over, chunk some spears, shoot, shoot a few mortars over, and they gonna scream and yell some retribution bullshit. That's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会过来，用长矛，射击，发射迫击炮，然后他们会尖叫，大喊一些狗屁的报复。仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyWhatToEx_00009D97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'Ol boy in charge is a pretty big douchebag, but I don't think that's in the official fucking reports, but, yeah, that pretty much sums him up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管事的老家伙是个十足的混蛋，但我不认为官方的报告会这么说，不过，没错，这差不多可以概括他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyWhatToEx_00009D97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will the Legion be able to cross the river in force?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团有能力大举渡河吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen the river? Ain't much more than a creek right now, shit. Fucking dam and the drought... screwing us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到那条河了吗？现在只剩下一条小溪了，该死。该死的大坝和干旱...把我们搞惨了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't we just retreat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么不撤退呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I'd say fuck yeah, but most of these slaves is... hell, walking wounded or plain exhausted. They can't move at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常我会该死的说是，但大多数奴隶...受伤或筋疲力尽，他们根本无法移动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRetreat_00003A29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're keeping them all shacked up in a cave back there. Only thing between that army and them is gonna be us here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把他们都关在后面的一个山洞里，那支军队和他们之间唯一的羁绊就是我们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyRetreat_00003A29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why exactly did Wickham hire you? Don't answer that - we'll make do. Just talk to me when you want to take on the next job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维克汉姆为什么要雇你？不用回答，我们将就一下。如果你想接下一份工作就跟我说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, as a matter of fact, I've got something for you right now. Adjacent to the ravine is a place called Chard Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我现在有些事要交给你，与溪谷相邻的是一个叫查德峡谷的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's one of our main supply routes. Unfortunately, our supply caravan hasn't checked in on time, and I'd like for you to go investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们的主要补给路线之一。不幸的是，我们的补给车队没有按时报到，我希望你能去调查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They probably just got drunk and they're held back somewhere, but just in case, I want you to check it out. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能只是喝醉了，藏起来了，但以防万一，我想让你去看看。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I'll be able to repair either robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我两个机器人都修不好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't have my hopes up, but thanks for trying nonetheless. Josey wants to see you. He's got something lined up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有抱太大希望，但还是要谢谢你的努力。乔西想见你，他已经有安排了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I can convince Major Spears to send reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我说服不了斯皮尔斯少校派援军来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is [%]. I'm a contractor at FOB Omega. We need help here, Major.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是[%]。我是欧米伽前线作战基地的承包人。我们需要帮助，少校。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now look here - I'm under strict orders here to maintain the garrison at its current strength. I can't deviate from it. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我奉命在这里维持驻军的兵力。我不能违背它，我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [%] here. It's high time you pull your head out of your ass and sent reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是[%]。别他妈犯浑了，赶紧派援军过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now look here - I'm under strict orders here to maintain the garrison at its current strength. I can't deviate from it. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我奉命在这里维持驻军的兵力。我不能违背它，我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, whoa, hold on, hold on. That's serious. I'll send a platoon your way, right now, okay? We'll just keep this conversation between us, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，哇，等等，等等。 那很严重，我现在就派一个排给你，好吗？ 这件事你知我知，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to be responsible for a massacre if you don't send help. They'll shoot you for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不派人来帮忙你就要为一场大屠杀负责，他们会为此杀了你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: GAME OVER, MAN! GAME OVER!
ESP.TRADUIT: 游戏结束，老哥！游戏结束！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Jesus! Okay! You got it! I'm sending a platoon, everything you need, right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，上帝！好吧！你搞定了！我派一个排去，你需要的一切，马上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Send troops, or I'll skin you over the airwaves. Your screams will echo through the entire Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 派部队来，否则我就通过无线电波剥了你的皮，你的尖叫会在整个莫哈维回响。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well... I... I guess I can. Reinforcements? You know, I think we can cut a little red tape for you, just this one time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好吧...我...我想我可以。增援部队吗？我觉得我们可以为你简化一下手续，就这一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll send the reinforcements your way, and after this all done, hey - look me up in Bullhead, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会给你派援军，等这一切结束，到布尔海德找我，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just love the sound of your voice. Could you say "reinforcements" slowly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是喜欢你的声音，你能慢慢地说“援军”吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. You know, you're right. We have to look out for each other, and if that means bending the rules, so be it. You'll get your reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，你说得对，我们必须互相照顾，如果这意味着违反规则，那就这样吧。你会得到增援的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know war, Major. This base will fall without reinforcements. Screw the orders. Help your troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我了解战争，少校。如果没有援军，这个基地就会陷落，违背命令，帮助你的军队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Terminate Communication> Omega out.
ESP.TRADUIT: <终止通信> 欧米伽结束。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radio [03003A2C] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave all the slaves in the cave. I don't want to put them in any more danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把所有的奴隶都留在山洞里，我不想让他们陷入更多的危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, we'll round them up, put them in there. In the meantime, why don't you help out some of these ones...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们把他们围起来，放在那里。与此同时，你为什么不帮助这些人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseySlavesLe_00003D82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over by the... foxholes over there. They just wandering around, moaning and helpless and shit, like a bunch of hobos. See what you can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在...散兵坑。他们到处游荡，呻吟，无助，就像一群流浪汉，看看你能做些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseySlavesLe_00003D82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pick out a handful of the most capable fighters to help defend the base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 挑选一些最有能力的战士来帮助保卫基地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There might be a few that can shoot or swing a bat. At the very least they'll stop a bullet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能会有一些人会开枪或挥棒，至少他们能挡子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseySlavesRe_00003D83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While we're getting them armed, why don't you go on over, help out some of them pathetic motherfuckers, just wandering around and shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 趁我们给他们准备武器的时候，你为什么不过去，帮帮那些可怜的混蛋们，他们在到处乱逛什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseySlavesRe_00003D83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grab every able-bodied slave and arm them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抓住所有强壮的奴隶，武装他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: INCOMPLETE
ESP.TRADUIT: 不完全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Show the scars on your hands>Marko tried his best to break me, but I got him in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: <展示你手上的伤疤>马尔科竭尽全力想击垮我，但还是被我打败了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn! They got you pretty good, didn't they? Hold on, I got one I can show you on my ass... well, you might not want to see that one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！他们对你很好，不是吗？等等，我有一个，在我屁股上，可以给你看...嗯，你可能不想看到那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be proud of them scars, my friend. You sure as shit earned them going up against Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该为这些伤疤感到骄傲，朋友，你战胜了马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I've seen from you is somebody who went through hell and came out on the other side, at least with some of their integrity intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从你身上看到的只是一个经历了地狱又从另一边走出来的人，至少还有一些完整的人格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That right there is something to be proud of - don't let nobody tell you otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是值得骄傲的事情...不要让任何人告诉你不是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to talk about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想谈论它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, didn't mean to pry too much there... just, uh... I don't know, sometimes it helps to talk about all that old bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不是故意打听的...只是，呃...我不知道，有时候说说那些老废话会有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyNVBIIIDo_000058EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I've seen from you is somebody who went through hell and came out on the other side, at least with some of their integrity intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从你身上看到的只是一个经历了地狱又从另一边走出来的人，至少还有一些完整的人格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyNVBIIIDo_000058EE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That right there is something to be proud of - don't let nobody tell you otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是值得骄傲的事情...不要让任何人告诉你不是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyNVBIIIDo_000058EE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was betrayed by several associates, and I lost a close friend as a result.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被几个同事出卖了，结果我失去了一个亲密的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, shit happens. One time I fucked up an op cause I was too busy whacking off in a foxhole, but... hey, what are you gonna do? Just human, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，倒楣的事情发生了。有一次我搞砸了一次行动，因为我在散兵坑里忙着打飞机，但是...嘿，你打算怎么办？都是人，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I've seen from you is somebody who went through hell and came out on the other side, at least with some of their integrity intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从你身上看到的只是一个经历了地狱又从另一边走出来的人，至少还有一些完整的人格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That right there is something to be proud of - don't let nobody tell you otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是值得骄傲的事情...不要让任何人告诉你不是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyNVBIIIBe_000058EB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a tragedy that I brought about inadvertantly. I'd like to forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我无意中造成的悲剧，我想忘掉它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, shit happens. One time I fucked up an op cause I was too busy whacking off in a foxhole, but... hey, what are you gonna do? Just human, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，倒楣的事情发生了。有一次我搞砸了一次行动，因为我在散兵坑里忙着打飞机，但是...嘿，你打算怎么办？都是人，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I've seen from you is somebody who went through hell and came out on the other side, at least with some of their integrity intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从你身上看到的只是一个经历了地狱又从另一边走出来的人，至少还有一些完整的人格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That right there is something to be proud of - don't let nobody tell you otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是值得骄傲的事情...不要让任何人告诉你不是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter now. Let's focus on the job at hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在无所谓了，让我们专注于手头的工作吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, didn't mean to pry too much there... just, uh... I don't know, sometimes it helps to talk about all that old bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不是故意打听的...只是，呃...我不知道，有时候说说那些老废话会有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyNVBIIIDo_000058ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I've seen from you is somebody who went through hell and came out on the other side, at least with some of their integrity intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从你身上看到的只是一个经历了地狱又从另一边走出来的人，至少还有一些完整的人格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyNVBIIIDo_000058ED_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That right there is something to be proud of - don't let nobody tell you otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是值得骄傲的事情...不要让任何人告诉你不是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyNVBIIIDo_000058ED_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned some hard lessons. Leave it at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得到了一些惨痛的教训，就这样吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, didn't mean to pry too much there... just, uh... I don't know, sometimes it helps to talk about all that old bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不是故意打听的...只是，呃...我不知道，有时候说说那些老废话会有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I've seen from you is somebody who went through hell and came out on the other side, at least with some of their integrity intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从你身上看到的只是一个经历了地狱又从另一边走出来的人，至少还有一些完整的人格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That right there is something to be proud of - don't let nobody tell you otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是值得骄傲的事情...不要让任何人告诉你不是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm [%]. How are you holding up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是[%]。你还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He shakes his head and glances toward the ground, clearly troubled.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他摇了摇头，看了看地面，显然很不安。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your malfunction, brat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么了，小子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He recoils in fear.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他害怕地往后缩。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, kid. You've been through a lot, haven't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松点，孩子。你经历了很多，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He nods, barely holding back tears.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他点了点头，勉强忍住眼泪。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give Nuka-Cola> Turns out I have an extra Nuka-Cola. Why don't you take it off my hands?
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他核子可乐>原来我多了一瓶核子可乐，你为什么不帮我拿走它呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He appears skeptical until you produce the Nuka-Cola, which he merrily gulps down.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他看上去很怀疑，直到你拿出了核子可乐，他高兴地一饮而尽。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He grins as you contort your face and make odd noises. His spirits have been lifted, even if only for a moment.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [当你扭着脸发出奇怪的声音时，他咧嘴一笑。他的精神振奋起来了，即使只有一小会儿。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Make a silly face and impersonate Caesar>
ESP.TRADUIT: <做个鬼脸，模仿凯撒>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He shudders and slips into the grips of anxiety. You managed to further traumatize him with your inept theatrics.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他颤抖着，陷入了焦虑之中。你笨拙的表演进一步伤害了他。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Impersonate a Deathclaw disemboweling a wastelander>
ESP.TRADUIT: <冒充一个正在挖废土人心脏的死亡爪>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [He listens closely as you relate the legendary tale of Ronald Dillinger. All his troubles are now a distant memory.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他仔细地听着你讲述罗纳德·狄林杰的传奇故事。他所有的烦恼现在都已成为遥远的回忆。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Tell the story of Ronald Dillinger's daring escape from his cruel master>
ESP.TRADUIT: <讲述罗纳德·狄林杰勇敢地逃离他残忍的主人的故事。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will any liquor do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喝点酒行吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes, I ain't picky! As long as it'll get me drunk, then I'm happy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我不挑剔！只要能让我喝醉，我就高兴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give him a bottle of water> Here, have some purified water.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他一瓶水>来，喝点纯净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a real nice thing of you to do. I do appreciate it. At least I can live out the last day of my life fully hydrated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这么做真是太好了。我真的很感激，至少我能在生命的最后一天喝足水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give him dirty water> All I have is this dirty water. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他一瓶污水>我只有这些脏水，抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's all right. I'll drink it the same. It tastes almost as good as the regular. Thank you very much. I appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，没关系。我还是一样的喝，它的味道几乎和普通的一样好，非常感谢，我很感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, I don't have any water to spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我没有多余的水了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's okay. I spent the last two days drinking my own piss, so I'll go right back to that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我这两天都在喝自己的尿，所以我还是回去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened over there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那边发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Started way back outside Flagstaff. They tried to make a couple tribes fight each other. They rose up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 从旗杆镇外面开始。他们试图让几个部落自相残杀，他们揭竿...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you know it, this guy they called Spartacus was head of the whole group, was kicking ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知不觉间，这个被他们称为斯巴达克斯的家伙成了整个组织的头头，很厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty sure that wasn't his real name, just something he took on to scare the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定那不是他的真名，只是他用来吓唬军团的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a good thing... pretty damn amazing, actually, for a while. We won a couple battles, and were on a roll, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是件好事...在一段时间内，确实是相当惊人。我们赢了几场，而且一帆风顺，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides Spartacus, we had a guy named Turner, and he wanted to attack Flagstaff itself. He was just... out for blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了斯巴达克斯，还有个叫特纳的人，他想袭击旗杆镇。他只是...为了流血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spartacus said we should go for NCR territory. Turner took most of the warriors, made an attack on Flagstaff...
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯巴达克斯说我们应该去NCR的地盘。特纳带走了大部分战士，袭击了旗杆镇...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it was bad. They got bushwhacked and just about annihilated. Old Atticus there, he crucified them on the road outside, all the way to Kingman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，很糟糕。他们遭到伏击，几乎全军覆没，老阿提库斯，他在外面的路上把他们钉死在十字架上，一路到金曼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and the rest of them fled with Spartacus west, and him and the remaining fighters, they...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和其他人跟着斯巴达克斯逃往西部，而斯巴达克斯和剩下的战士，他们...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: They stayed back in a pass to make sure... ones like me and these women and young folks could make it this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们留在一个隘口，以确保...像我这样的人，这些女性和年轻人可以逃走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brave man, and... we wouldn't be here if it wasn't for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 勇敢的人...如果不是他，我们也不会在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, he replaced Marcellus after he was assassinated. Name is Titus Atticus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马塞卢斯被暗杀后，他接替了他的职位。名字叫提图斯·阿提库斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He claimed Marcellus had gone soft, so he kicked thing in order. His mission is to stamp out the rebellion by killing every single slave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说马塞卢斯心软了，所以他把事情收拾好了。他的任务是杀死每一个奴隶来镇压叛乱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's already crucified a bunch, now he's just killing them all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他已经把一群人钉死在十字架上了，现在又把他们全杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: He inherited most of Marcellus' army, so they're a tough group, and they know how to fight. They'll kill us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他继承了马塞卢斯的大部分兵力，所以他们是一支强大的军队，他们知道如何作战。他们会把我们都杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about the Legion commander?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道军团指挥官的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He commanded a big army in the south, got obsessed with old Firebase Zulu there. Attacked it twice, lost both times just barely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在南方指挥了一支庞大的军队，对那里的祖鲁火力点很着迷，两次进攻，两次都输得很惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Second time he was killed. Some people say it was Caesar gave the orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二次进攻后他被杀了，有人说是凯撒下的命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcellus was a bit smarter than Titus, not as... just, crazy. That's all there is to say about Atticus. He's like a mad dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马塞卢斯比提图斯聪明一点，而不是...只是,疯子。关于阿提库斯，我只能说这么多，他就像一条疯狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's kind of like Lanius, he... he just comes at you with everything he's got, and he won't stop until he's won or he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有点像拉尼尔斯，他...他会带着他的一切来找你，不赢，不死，他是不会罢休的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what happened to us... not much strategy to it, he just overran and overwhelmed us, and it was just killing. Seen too much of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是发生在我们身上的事情...没有什么策略，他就冲了过来，把我们压得喘不过气来，简直就是杀人。我看得太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about Marcellus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对马塞卢斯了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made one mistake. You shouldn't throw it all away because of one setback.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你犯了一个错误，你不应该因为一次挫折就放弃一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think that? I mean, I'd considered it, and there's always a chance I could get transferred out here, but, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真这么想？我是说，我考虑过了，我总有机会被调到这里，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only way I can redeem myself is through some kind of combat action, and I'm not gonna see that here, most likely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一能救赎自己的方法就是通过某种战斗行动，而我很可能不会在这里看到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, look, even if the Legion does show up here, it's probably not going to be much more than say, a raiding party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，听着，即使军团真的出现在这里，也可能只是一支突袭小队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the brass has made it abundantly clear what they think of my career prospects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，上级已经把对我职业前景的看法说得很清楚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done your service. Why not go back to teaching?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经完成了你的使命，为什么不回去教书呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've always had my heart set on it, and I'd like to do some writing as well. Maybe I can write something that will torture academics late at night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直一心想做这个，而且我也想写点东西。也许我可以写点东西让学者们深更半夜受苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your call. Can't say I blame you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由你决定，我不能怪你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I blame myself, either. Let's get back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不能怪自己，我们回去工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why aren't you wearing Ranger combat armor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不穿游骑兵的战斗装甲？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck that bulky shit... I've got cheap bourbon whiskey and pearl snaps, bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的大垃圾...我有便宜的波旁威士忌和珍珠饼干，贱人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyArmorCom_00009D92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {4 seconds of silence}
ESP.TRADUIT: {4秒沉默}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BE]aaTBAIntroSlides) Intro Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {4 seconds of silence}
ESP.TRADUIT: {4秒沉默}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BE]aaTBAIntroSlides) Intro Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got a ways to go, so listen up. Ain't no secret that the Legion treats slaves like dogshit. Pretty much the norm all through all their territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有很长的路要走，听好了，军团对待奴隶就像对待狗屎，这不是什么秘密。在他们的领地里，这几乎是常态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BE]aaTBAIntroSlides) Intro Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That continued until some fellah named Spartacus figured they'd had enough of their old bullshit. Rose up and formed a slave army, kicked ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一直这样，直到有个叫斯巴达克斯的家伙觉得他们受够了以前的鬼话，奋起组建了一支奴隶军队，狠狠地揍了他一顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BE]aaTBAIntroSlides) Intro Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though it ain't clear why, the slave army got split up. Legion took the opportunity to chew 'em up one piece at a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然还不清楚原因，但奴隶军队分裂了。军团抓住机会把它们一块一块地吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BE]aaTBAIntroSlides) Intro Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since then, we've gotten reports that a big bunch of slaves is heading towards the Colorado, with a Legion army right on their tail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那以后，我们接到报告说一大群奴隶正朝科罗拉多河进发，身后跟着一支军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BE]aaTBAIntroSlides) Intro Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why we're heading to, yes, thank you Watson, FOB Omega, so that we can watch for the slaves, and if need be, stand tall against the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么我们要去，是的，谢谢你，沃森，欧米茄前线作战基地，这样我们就可以监视奴隶，如果需要的话，我们可以挺身对抗军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BE]aaTBAIntroSlides) Intro Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, so you're good at pushups and shit, so you deserve to be giving me orders? That'll be the fucking day. I'll frag you myself before that happens!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，所以你擅长俯卧撑之类的狗屎，你就该对我发号施令吗？那他妈就是那一天，我会在那前亲手炸死你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who did better at the rifle range? That's the shit that counts! Fuck your fucking pushups, and your nasty fucking steroid pecs, you freak!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁在射击场表现更好？这才是最重要的！去你妈的俯卧撑，还有你那恶心的类固醇胸肌，你个怪胎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lewis? I wouldn't fuck her with a Deathclaw's dick! You dip your wick in that, you might as well hold a funeral for your dick, you dumb bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 露易丝？我才不会用死亡爪的老二操她！你去跟她性交，还不如给你的鸡巴办个葬礼呢，你个傻逼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, she's as pure as the snow. Why do think Johnson had to get a medical evac? He stuck his cock in there... fucked him up good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，她像雪一样纯洁。你觉得约翰逊为什么会接受医疗后送？他把鸡巴插进去了...被打得很惨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Legion booby trap... sure. I'll tell you what, why don't you just tempt fate, go ahead and jump in the sack with Lewis, see what happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个军团的陷阱...当然。我跟你说，你为什么不碰碰运气，去跟露易丝上床，看看会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smart move, stud. You can borrow my big girls mag if you want, but for Christ's sake, stop jerking off onto the pages! It's like fucking superglue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 聪明之举，种马。你可以借我的《大女孩》杂志，但看在上帝的份上，别对着书页打飞机了！就像他妈的强力胶一样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCCPromotionCo_0000AD2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and don't give me any shit about it. I've got a great PT score, I got a good chance of getting promoted. Pretty soon I'll be giving you orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，别跟我提这事。我的体能成绩很好，升职的机会很大。很快我就会给你下命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna be giving you orders, and I'm gonna give you orders and I'll fucking do the pec pop while I do it. You'll have to listen, little weakling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要给你下命令，我还会一边做胸肌训练一边给你下命令。你得听着，小懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, really? Private Lewis seemed to think pretty highly of them, when I had my shirt off working in that fucking detail. She was giving me the eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，真的吗？列兵露易丝似乎对他们评价很高，当我脱了衣服在那鬼地方工作的时候。她向我抛媚眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah, like mister living corpse has room to lecture people on hygiene and cleanliness. That is a malicious rumor, just slander. She is beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，就像“活尸先生”有空间教人们卫生和清洁。那是恶意的谣言，纯粹的诽谤。她很漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, now I know you're full of shit. Official reports said Johnson had an unidentified infection of the foot. He probably stepped on a booby trap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，现在我知道你满嘴屁话了。官方报道称约翰逊脚上有不明感染，他可能踩到了陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCCPromotionCu_0000AD29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, thank you for the prognosis, Doctor Zombie, I'll just fucking... well... you know, I think I'm gonna wait, I'll just, I'll fucking jerk off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，谢谢你的诊断，僵尸医生，我他妈...嗯...我想我还是等等吧，我就，我他妈还是打飞机吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thanks! That's the ass man edition, right? Oh, that's my favorite! I'm going to the shitter. If I'm not back in ten minutes, send somebody...
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，谢谢！那是臀控版，对吧？喔，那是我的最爱！我要去厕所。如果我十分钟后还没回来，派人来...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCCPromotionCu_0000AD2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give vodka> You like vodka?
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他伏特加>你喜欢伏特加吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you! That's gonna hit the spot. At least I can spend my last day on earth with a nice buzz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢谢你！这正合我意，至少，我可以在酣畅淋漓中度过我在地球上的最后一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give scotch> Here's some of the good stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他苏格兰威士忌>这儿有一些好东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you! That's gonna hit the spot. At least I can spend my last day on earth with a nice buzz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢谢你！这正合我意，至少，我可以在酣畅淋漓中度过我在地球上的最后一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give whiskey> How about some whiskey?
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他威士忌>喝点威士忌怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you! That's gonna hit the spot. At least I can spend my last day on earth with a nice buzz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢谢你！这正合我意，至少，我可以在酣畅淋漓中度过我在地球上的最后一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give beer> Have a cold one, old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他啤酒>喝杯冰啤酒，老头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you! That's gonna hit the spot. At least I can spend my last day on earth with a nice buzz.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，谢谢你！这正合我意，至少，我可以在酣畅淋漓中度过我在地球上的最后一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have any alcohol to spare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我没有多余的酒了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's okay. Before I got to the river, I'd been drinking my own piss for three days, so... anything is better than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。在我到河边之前，我已经喝了三天自己的尿了，所以...任何东西都比这好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runaway Slave [030055C3] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened over there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那边发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Through careful gesticulation, he re-enacts the slave revolt in great detail. Apparently it was a dramatic, drawn-out affair.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [通过细致的手势，他非常详细地再现了奴隶起义。显然，这是一场戏剧性的、旷日持久的事件。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close, kid. I'll make sure you get home safely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 靠近点，孩子。我会确保你安全回家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His expression brightens. He is clearly comforted by your words.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他的表情变得明朗起来,你的话显然让他感到安慰。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't fall behind or you'll be Gecko shit, runt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别落在后面，不然你会变成蜥蜴屎的，小矮子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [His eyes widen with fear as he frantically nods in response.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他惊恐地睁大了眼睛，疯狂地点头回应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ryan [03003D7E] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't really matter. He's safe, and that's what counts. Just take good care of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不重要。他很安全，这才是最重要的，好好照顾他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're the one who... ran off the Fiends, and shot up the Syndicate, and all that mess. Yeah, I've heard of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，是你...从恶魔帮那里跑了出来，给辛迪加来了几枪，还有其他乱七八糟的事。是的，我听说过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDoe_0000B7B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to say, you've done so much for us here. You look outside, damn Fiends are run off, we got more militia...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想说，你为我们做了这么多。你看看外面，该死的恶魔帮都跑了，我们有更多的民兵...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDoe_0000B7B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And hell, now you brought my nephew to me. You need anything, everything here in the store is full discount, whatever you need, to say the least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你又把我侄子带来见我。你需要什么，商店里的所有东西都是全折扣的，你需要什么都行，至少可以这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDoe_0000B7B6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just a courier. Take care of Ryan, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是个邮差。照顾好瑞安，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're the one who... ran off the Fiends, and shot up the Syndicate, and all that mess. Yeah, I've heard of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，是你...从恶魔帮那里跑了出来，给辛迪加来了几枪，还有其他乱七八糟的事。是的，我听说过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDoi_0000B7B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to say, you've done so much for us here. You look outside, damn Fiends are run off, we got more militia...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想说，你为我们做了这么多。你看看外面，该死的恶魔帮都跑了，我们有更多的民兵...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDoi_0000B7B7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And hell, now you brought my nephew to me. You need anything, everything here in the store is full discount, whatever you need, to say the least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你又把我侄子带来见我。你需要什么，商店里的所有东西都是全折扣的，你需要什么都行，至少可以这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDoi_0000B7B7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ryan was with the slaves that just crossed the river. I helped repel the Legion attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞安和刚过河的奴隶在一起。我帮助击退了军团的进攻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're the one who... ran off the Fiends, and shot up the Syndicate, and all that mess. Yeah, I've heard of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，是你...从恶魔帮那里跑了出来，给辛迪加来了几枪，还有其他乱七八糟的事。是的，我听说过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneJus_0000B7B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to say, you've done so much for us here. You look outside, damn Fiends are run off, we got more militia...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想说，你为我们做了这么多。你看看外面，该死的恶魔帮都跑了，我们有更多的民兵...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneJus_0000B7B9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And hell, now you brought my nephew to me. You need anything, everything here in the store is full discount, whatever you need, to say the least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你又把我侄子带来见我。你需要什么，商店里的所有东西都是全折扣的，你需要什么都行，至少可以这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneJus_0000B7B9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to fight off an entire Legion army, jackass. Try not to lose him this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须得击退整个军团，混蛋。这次可别把他弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you're the one who... ran off the Fiends, and shot up the Syndicate, and all that mess. Yeah, I've heard of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，是你...从恶魔帮那里跑了出来，给辛迪加来了几枪，还有其他乱七八糟的事。是的，我听说过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDon_0000B7B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to say, you've done so much for us here. You look outside, damn Fiends are run off, we got more militia...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想说，你为我们做了这么多。你看看外面，该死的恶魔帮都跑了，我们有更多的民兵...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDon_0000B7B8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And hell, now you brought my nephew to me. You need anything, everything here in the store is full discount, whatever you need, to say the least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你又把我侄子带来见我。你需要什么，商店里的所有东西都是全折扣的，你需要什么都行，至少可以这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneDon_0000B7B8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to order something to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想点些吃的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's what we got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneBuy_0000B7BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来蛮好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Just have a seat here and we'll get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！在这儿坐好，我们马上开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recognize that suit, Syndicate slime. I'll send you to hell with Zimmer and the rest of them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认得那套西装，辛迪加的渣滓。我会让你和齐默还有其他人一起下地狱的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit, I am not Syndicate! For fuck's sake, I bought this thing used, I don't have any weapons or anything, Jesus Christ!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天呐，我不是辛迪加！看在上帝的份上，我买的是二手的，我没有任何武器，上帝啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, I just want to interview you, nothing else. If you're convinced I'm not a secret assassin, just sit down here and we'll get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，我只是想采访你，没别的。如果你确信我不是秘密刺客的话，就在这里坐下，我们马上开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I see this was a wasted trip. We'll just have to print the outlandish crap from the Coyote Courier and those seedy dime novels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看这次旅行白跑一趟了，我们只能把《郊狼邮差》这种稀奇古怪的低俗小说拿出来印了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if you'd like to tell your side of the story as it actually happened... just have a seat. Dinner's on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，如果你愿意如实讲述你的故事...请坐。晚饭我请客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what we had on file, but I wanted to be sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们档案里的资料，但我想确认一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, what made you begin bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，你为什么要开始赏金狩猎？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, my name is fuck yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我的名字是操你妈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is going to be a long, long day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是将是漫长，漫长的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, what made you begin bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，你为什么要开始赏金狩猎？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want my name printed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想把我的名字印出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fair enough, I'll make sure we leave out any mention of your name. We'll just leave it at "The Courier."
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我保证不提你的名字。我们就用“邮差”印上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, what made you begin bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，你为什么要开始赏金狩猎？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Aiden Burke [0300B7BB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else I can help with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a matter of fact, yes. The supermutant down there, Private Cutty, refuses to use a minigun that was issued to us by command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，是的。下面那个超级变种人，二等兵卡蒂，拒绝使用命令发给我们的转轮机枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's the only one with the strength to handle that thing, and it could make a huge difference if the Legion does show up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是唯一有力量对付那东西的人，如果军团真的出现在这里，情况会大不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can... allay his fears and convince him to use it, I think it would benefit us all. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能...消除他的恐惧并说服他使用它，我想这对我们大家都有好处。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The CO said there's a minigun that you're afraid to use. What's the problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 指挥官说有一把你不敢用的转轮机枪。是什么问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no! No way! That thing's like a goddamn death trap, soon as I shoot it it's gonna blow up right in my face, blow my fingers off...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不！没门！那东西就像个该死的死亡陷阱，我一开枪，它就会在我脸上炸开，炸掉我的手指...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be fucking... having to eat with little nubs, I'll look like a fucking mole rat! Blind and waddling around... be a fucking freak on a leash!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会他妈的...只能吃小块的东西，我会看起来像他妈的鼹鼠！瞎了眼，摇摇晃晃的走着...变成个用皮带拴着的他妈的怪物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm just as effective with grenades and my hammer here. I don't really need a gun, okay? That's it, end of story. No gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我用手榴弹和锤子也一样有效。我不需要枪，好吗？就这样，故事结束了，不要枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Geeze, talk about a guilt trip when you put it like that! Okay, yes sir and all that shit! Fucking goddamn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，你这么说真让人内疚！好的，长官还有那些该死的东西！真他妈该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your commanding officer gave you an order. You're a soldier - do your damn job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的指挥官给你下了命令。你是个士兵，好好干你该死的活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, you just been listening to Cocker's bullshit for too much. No fucking way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你只是听了太多科克尔的废话。他妈的没门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't use the minigun, I'll bet that Cocker shows you up in the battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不使用转轮机枪，我敢打赌科克尔在战斗中让你难堪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, okay, I'll trust you... but if it blows my hands off, I'm gonna beat you up with by nubs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我相信你...但如果它炸掉我的手，我会狠狠揍你一顿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there's one thing I know, it's guns. The minigun is perfectly safe once you learn how it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果说我只懂一样东西，那就是枪，一旦你了解了它的工作原理，这把转轮机枪就绝对安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit! The minigun and me are one! This is my minigun, there are many like it but this one is mine! Yes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天呐！转轮机枪和我是一体的！这是我的转轮机枪，有很多类似的，但这一把是我的！对！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use that minigun or I'll give your brain a high and tight with a straight razor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用那把转轮机枪，否则我就用剃刀给你剃个战士寸头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are right. I should have trusted in his wisdom. What would Bad Mothafucka do? He would pick up the minigun and kill shit. That's it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，我应该相信他的智慧。臭傻逼会怎么做？他会拿起转轮机枪开杀，就是这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mothafucka.
ESP.TRADUIT: 臭傻逼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's Ryan doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 瑞安怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, he's doing just fine. We got him in the school, he's picking things up real well. Thank you again for what you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他做得很好。我们把他送进了学校，他恢复得很好。再次感谢你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James Stone [0300B4A1] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJamesStoneVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJamesStoneRya_0000CE8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incoming!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaINCOMING_0000CEB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incoming!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaINCOMING_0000CEB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mortars! Take cover!
ESP.TRADUIT: 迫击炮！注意隐蔽！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaINCOMING_0000CEB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mortars! Get down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 迫击炮！趴下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incoming!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 趴下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the Primes! Let 'em have it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是精华！让他们尝尝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: INC
ESP.TRADUIT: 炮火来袭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it! There's Titus himself! Buckle down and hold on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是他！提图斯自己上了！全力以赴，坚持住！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Told you you'd have been better off just cutting it off with her. She's probably riding his dick. What's his name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你说过了，跟她断绝关系会更好。她可能在骑他的老二，他叫什么名字来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking kidding me? She's riding his dick night and day! She probably wrote that letter while she was sitting on the dick...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈开什么玩笑？她没日没夜的骑着他的鸡巴！她可能是坐在鸡巴上写那封信的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm the best friend you got, because I tell you the harsh fucking truth. Picture Sarah riding his dick right now... moaning and screaming...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是你最好的朋友，因为我会告诉你残酷的真相。想象一下莎拉现在骑着他的鸡巴...呻吟和尖叫...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's good! You're doing great! Now when the Legion comes, imagine every one of them is Jody, okay? You will kill them all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那太好了！你做的很好！现在，当军团来的时候，想象他们每个人都是乔迪，好吗？你会把他们都杀了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCuttyJody_0000D7BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, excuse me, here we go! The drama queen at it again! I was just trying to give you a boost, you big baby! Harden the fuck up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不好意思，又来了！小题大做的家伙又来了！我只是想帮你一把，你个大宝贝！他妈的硬起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCuttyJody_0000D7BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right. If the Legion comes, they're gonna throw a grenade in here, I'm gonna throw your body on top of it, and then I'm gonna use you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，对。如果军团来了，他们会在这里扔手榴弹，我会把你的尸体扔在上面，然后利用你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right, even if I die, I'll still come back to haunt you. The day I die is the day your nightmare begins, bitch. I still don't understand...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，就算我死了，我还是会回来缠着你。我死的那天就是你噩梦的开始，贱人。我还是不明白...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell you what... next time we're on leave, we'll find Jody, I'll hold him down, and you can stab him in the face. Sound good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你说...下次我们休假的时候，我们会找到乔迪，我会按住他，你可以在他脸上捅一刀。这样听起来不错吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She said his name is Jody. Could be nothing, she said he's just real helpful, moved some furniture and fixed a sink. It's probably nothing, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说他叫乔迪。可能没什么，她说他只是帮了些忙，搬了些家具，修了个水槽。可能没什么，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the fuck would you say that? You're supposed to be a friend and make some shit up! You're supposed to tell me that she loves me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈为什么要这么说？你应该是我的朋友，然后瞎编一些故事来骗我！你应该告诉我她爱我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough, you goddamn motherfucker! I'm gonna kill Jody! I swear to God! I'm gonna go on leave... fuck it, I'll go AWOL! I'm gonna cut...
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，你这该死的混蛋！我要杀了乔迪！我对天发誓！我要休假了...去他妈的，我要擅离职守了！我要割...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck are you saying? Was this all a fucking mind-fuck for you? You just ruined my life, you stupid motherfucker! I can't think about war...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的在说什么？这一切对你来说都是胡扯吗？你刚刚毁了我的生活，你个蠢蛋！我不能去想战争...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it! You're dead to me! I'd take a bullet for anybody in this army, except you! Legion comes, you're shit out of luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样！你对我来说已经死了！我愿意为军队里的任何人挡子弹，除了你！军团来了，你就倒霉了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fat chance! You're just a big fucking target, that's what you are! They're gonna shoot you right in the fucking face, cause you're scared of guns...
ESP.TRADUIT: 门都没有！你他妈就是个大靶子，就是这样！他们会朝你的脸开一枪，因为你怕枪...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. Sorry. It's just... here I am, thinking she liked me, we had something special. She's fucking this douchebag behind my back...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的。对不起，只是...我还以为她喜欢我，我们之间有些特别的感情。她背着我跟这个混蛋鬼混...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the best idea you ever had, you crazy fucking mutant. We're gonna kill Jody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你想到的最好的主意，你这个该死的变种人。我们要杀了乔迪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialogue_aaCockerJody_0000D7C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was always a fool for my Johnny, for the one they call... Johnny Guitar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的约翰尼面前，我一直是个傻瓜，他们叫他...约翰尼吉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck is your problem? You're like everybody else, hating on a good fucking song. That's a great track, got a lot of soul and heart in it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈有什么毛病？你和其他人一样，讨厌一首好歌。这是一首很棒的歌，充满了灵魂和感情...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, excuse me! You gonna throw some holy water on me, fucking Father Cocker there? Nothing satanic about Johnny Guitar! It's a song about love...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不好意思！你要往我身上泼圣水吗，该死的科克尔神父？约翰尼吉他一点也不邪恶！这是一首关于爱的歌...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'm scared of the devil? He doesn't scare me. I was in the Master's Army, bitch. I can fucking take that shit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我怕魔鬼吗？他吓不到我。我以前在主教的军队服役过，贱人。我他妈受得了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah? I was always a fool for my Johnny, for the one... okay, goddamit! I'll fucking stop, you sonofabitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是吗？为了我的约翰尼，我一直是个傻瓜，为了那个...好吧，该死！我他妈不说了，你这狗娘养的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerJohnnyG_0000DAC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Spiteful muttering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <恶意的喃喃自语>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cutty, I can put up with a lot... the farts, the bullshit, the grabass, whatever... but if you sing that fucking song again, I'm gonna shoot you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂，我很能忍...放响屁，瞎扯淡，摸我的屁股，等等...但如果你再他妈的唱那首该死的歌，我就开枪了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerJohnnyG_0000DABD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has fuckall to do with the legitimate plight of the ghouls. This is about good and evil. Johnny Guitar was written and performed by Satan...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这跟食尸鬼的合法困境有他妈的关系。这是关于善恶的，约翰尼吉他是由撒旦创作和表演的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerJohnnyG_0000DABF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again with the z-word... you got no fucking respect for decency, courtesy, basic fucking morality. You're a fucking devil worshipper...
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是z字...你他妈一点都不尊重体面，没有礼貌，基本的道德。你他妈是个恶魔崇拜者...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerJohnnyG_0000DAC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That right there proves how far gone you are. You don't play games when you're talking about the devil's genitalia. It's a fucking serious thing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这证明了你已经走远了。当你在谈论魔鬼的生殖器时，你可不是在玩游戏。这是一件很严肃的事...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's how you wanna play it? Okay, motherfucker... AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH! That's goddamn right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就想这么玩吗？好吧，混蛋...啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊哈哈哈哈哈啊！太他妈对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerJohnnyG_0000DAC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Spiteful muttering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <恶意的喃喃自语>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
