ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hell no! You did not just blame this shit on me. You were the one that created a hostile work environment...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那可不！你不该把这事怪到我头上，是你创造了一个充满敌意的工作环境...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyFrosthil_0000DACB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your fucking fault! You chose to walk out and continue giving me shit! It's not like I fucking forced you! Nobody put a gun to your head...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的是你的错！是你自己选择走出去，然后继续给我找麻烦！又不是我逼你的！没人拿枪指着你的头...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyFrosthil_0000DACD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it wasn't for me guiding you away from there, you'd be a fucking dead man! You'd be cutting hair in hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是我带你离开那里，你早他妈死了！你在地狱里给人理发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyFrosthil_0000DACF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, bitch. You'd have been crying and sobbing and all that shit. Marko would've just looked at you and you'd have pissed your fucking pants!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请，婊子。你就会哭啊哭啊什么的，马尔科就会看着你然后你就会尿裤子了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyFrosthil_0000DAD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? You're a disappointment at life. That's right. You couldn't do fucking shit. All you did was fucking bitch and moan...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？你的生活令人失望，这没问题，但你他妈的什么都做不了。你所做的一切只是抱怨和呻吟...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyFrosthil_0000DAD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was going to perform a public service by enlisting in a non-combat MOS. Your stupid ass volunteered for fucking infantry...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算通过加入非战斗部队来履行公共服务。你这蠢货自愿加入了他妈的步兵...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitch, I'm gonna show you POG! I'm gonna kill so many fucking Legion that they're gonna have to line this foxhole with their fucking skulls...
ESP.TRADUIT: 婊子，我让你见识一下非战斗人员！我要杀那么多该死的军团，让他们用脑袋把这个散兵坑围起来...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing that needs to get planted in throats is some lozenges or something, because I can't understand what you're saying...
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一需要放进喉咙的就是含片之类的东西，因为我听不懂你在说什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah? I'm gonna file discrimination charges against you, and you're gonna die first, motherfucker! I'm gonna go and talk to the CO right now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是吗？我要以歧视罪起诉你，你会先死的，混蛋！我现在就去和指挥官谈谈...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Spiteful muttering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <恶意的喃喃自语>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hostile work environment? You are the biggest pussy in the history of the universe. All I did was give you shit for not sweeping...
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌意的工作环境？你是宇宙历史上最大的孬种。我只是因为你不打扫而骂了你一顿...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DACC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it wasn't for you, I'd still be cutting hair, and you'd have your fucking snowmen. You're like a little girl, decorating it and shit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是你，我还在剪头发，你还留着你那该死的雪人。你就像个小女孩，在装饰它...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DACE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullshit. I saw it coming a mile away. I knew about the whole Virgil-Marko thing, it was fucking painfully obvious, dumbass ruse...
ESP.TRADUIT: 扯淡。我在一英里外就看到了，我知道整个维吉尔·马尔科的事，这是他妈显而易见的蠢把戏...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DAD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're full of shit. Marko's a big fucking disappointment. Everything I heard over the years, he's supposed to be the ultimate badass...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你满嘴屁话。马尔科真他妈让人失望，这些年来我听到的一切，他应该是终极坏蛋...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DAD2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? There's nothing more pathetic than a butthurt mutant. You are a sad, sad creature, and all this shit is still your fault, asshole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么？没有什么比一个玻璃心变种人更可悲的了。你真是个可悲的生物，这一切都是你的错，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DAD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you're still a POG at heart. Why don't you just go back to your non-combat MOS, get a nice little desk job...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你骨子里还是个非战斗人员。你为什么不回到你的非战斗岗位，找一份不错的文职工作...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DAD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing lining this foxhole is gonna be your tears, and then your blood, cause you're gonna cry, and then you're gonna die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个散兵坑里只会有你的眼泪，然后是你的血，因为你会哭，然后你会死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DAD8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough! I'm not taking that shit anymore! I'm taking it up the chain of command! They're gonna put you on charges for discrimination...
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！我再也受不了你的胡扯了！我要向上级汇报！他们会以歧视罪起诉你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DADA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Spiteful muttering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <恶意的喃喃自语>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCockerVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerFrosthi_0000DADC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So happened that the Courier saved the goddamn day at Camp Shit, I mean FOB Omega, saving countless lives and changing the course of the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 碰巧邮差在那个鬼营地拯救了那该死的一天，我是说欧米茄前线作战基地，拯救了无数的生命，改变了战争的进程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those that survived would always maintain a unique reverence for the Courier who had shared the peril of battle against a powerful adversary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些幸存下来的人总是对邮差保持着一种独特的敬意，因为他与强大的对手共同经历了危险的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR would go on to award the defenders a range of medals and commendations, though many were posthumous.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR将继续授予守卫者一系列的奖章和嘉奖，尽管许多都是在死后颁发的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Survived, became teacher}Sickened by the carnage of battle and frustrated by hurdles to advancement, Hodges resigned his commission once his term of service was complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Survived, became teacher}霍奇斯对战争的大屠杀感到厌恶，对晋升的障碍感到沮丧，他在服役期结束后辞去了他的职务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Survived, became teacher}He then threw himself into his first passion - teaching history. In his spare time, Hodges steadily crafted an account of the battle at FOB Omega.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Survived, became teacher}然后，他投身于他的第一爱好...教历史。在他的业余时间，霍奇斯编写了一份关于欧米茄前线作战基地之战的报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Survived, became teacher}Though it was considered painfully dry and academic, Hodges' account would persist as required reading for history students throughout the Republic.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Survived, became teacher}尽管霍奇斯的这本书被认为是枯燥而学术性的，但它还是成为了整个共和国历史学生的必读书目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Survived, became career officer}Due to his leadership in the defense at FOB Omega, any mention of Hodges' past indiscretions were scrubbed from his records.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Survived, became career officer}由于他在欧米茄前线作战基地时的领导能力，任何关于霍奇斯过去的不检点行为都从他的记录中被抹去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Survived, became career officer}Now hailed as a model officer by NCR Command, Hodges enjoyed limitless career opportunities due to his newfound fame.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Survived, became career officer}现在，霍奇斯被NCR司令部誉为模范军官，由于他的新名声，他享有无限的职业发展机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Survived, became career officer}For years he would ride a tide of positive publicity to promotions, commendations, and political connections, quickly rising to the rank of Major.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Survived, became career officer}多年来，他乘着正面宣传的浪潮，获得晋升、嘉奖和政治关系，迅速晋升为少校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Survived, became career officer}Though Hodges sometimes longed to resume teaching, he committed himself to ensuring the safety and well-being of everyone under his command.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Survived, became career officer}虽然霍奇斯有时很想继续教书，但他致力于确保他手下每个人的安全和幸福。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}Leading from the front, Hodges fell alongside his troops in their brave stand on the Colorado River.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}霍奇斯身先士卒，在科罗拉多河上与他的军队并肩战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}NCR Command immediately vaunted Hodges as a hero and model officer, going so far as to rename a parade deck in his honor.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}NCR指挥部立即将霍奇斯标榜为英雄和模范军官，甚至以他的名义重新命名了一个阅兵甲板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DEAD}Many of the surviving slaves would make a pilgrimage to FOB Omega to honor Hodges and his soldiers. A makeshift shrine remains there to this day.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DEAD}许多幸存的奴隶会去欧米茄前线作战基地朝圣，以纪念霍奇斯和他的士兵。直到今天，那里还保留着一个临时的神社。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}After sheparding the slaves to Bullhead, Josey took some well-earned leave and then resumed his duties as a ranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}在把奴隶们带到布尔海德后，乔西休了一段应得的假，然后重新开始了游骑兵的职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}With Watson to keep his wild side in check, Josey managed to earn a leadership position within his unit.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}有了沃森控制住他狂野的一面，乔西在他的团队中获得了领导地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}Although a few rangers would recommend Josey as a replacement for Hanlon, he would never be considered a serious candidate.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}尽管一些游骑兵会推荐乔西作为汉隆的替代者，但他永远不会被认为是一个严肃的候选人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}Regardless, Josey found fulfillment in his career, sharing countless adventures with his steadfast partner, Watson.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson survived - Josey thrives as ranger}无论如何，乔西在他的职业生涯中找到了成就感，与他坚定的伙伴沃森分享了无数冒险经历。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}After guiding the slaves to Bullhead, Josey descended into nonstop binge drinking as a means to deal with the death of his friend, Ranger Watson.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}在把奴隶们带到布尔海德后，乔西陷入了无休止的酗酒，以此来逃避他的朋友游骑兵沃森的阵亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}In spite of his bravery and proven combat prowess, Josey was discharged from the rangers due to his constant drunkenness and insubordination.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}尽管乔西很勇敢，也证明了他的战斗能力，但由于他经常酗酒和不服从命令，他被游骑兵除名了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}Unemployed and without prospects, Josey traveled to New Reno, where he stumbled into the pornographic film industry.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}失业又前途渺茫的乔西来到了新里诺，在那里他无意中进入了色情电影行业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}With his strong screen presence and willingness to engage in even the most perverted acts, Josey quickly became a star.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}凭借他在银幕上的强大存在感和参与最变态表演的意愿，乔西迅速成为了明星。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}Eventually Josey would become a respected producer, releasing such classics as "The Love Rug" and "Invasion of the Alien Hussies."
ESP.TRADUIT: {Watson died - Josey kicked out, becomes porn producer}最终，乔西成为了一个受人尊敬的制作人，发行了诸如《爱的假发》和《外星荡妇入侵》等经典作品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}Having defended their position and survived against overwhelming odds, Cocker and Cutty emerged from battle with a new lease on life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}在捍卫了自己的地位并战胜了压倒性的巨大困难之后，科克尔和卡蒂在战斗中获得了新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}The remainder of their enlistment consisted of rebuilding and guarding FOB Omega, which would never experience another full-scale assault.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}他们剩下的任务是重建和守卫欧米茄前线作战基地，那里再也不会遭受全面的攻击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}With newfound pride, the pair eventually left the service and penned a vivid account of the war called "With the Mutant Breed."
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}带着新找到的自豪感，这对搭档最终离开了军队，并撰写了一本生动的战争故事，名为《与变种人交配》。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}Critics lauded the book for its vivid, unfiltered account of war. The duo would use their royalties to build a chain of barbershops throughout NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}评论家称赞这本书生动、不加过滤地描述了战争。二人用他们的版税在共和国境内建立了一家连锁理发店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cutty dies - Cocker becomes taskmaster NCO}Devastated by the death of his comrade, Cocker was consumed by hatred for the Legion and became obsessed with discipline.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cutty dies - Cocker becomes taskmaster NCO}战友的死亡让科克尔悲痛欲绝，对军团的仇恨吞噬了他，他开始沉迷于纪律。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cutty dies - Cocker becomes taskmaster NCO}Cocker soon earned the rank of sergeant, and though a model soldier, junior enlisted resented his harsh methods and stern, humorless demeanor.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cutty dies - Cocker becomes taskmaster NCO}科克尔很快就获得了中士的军衔，虽然是一名模范士兵，但下级士兵对他严厉的方法和苛刻、缺乏幽默感的行为感到不满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cutty dies - Cocker becomes taskmaster NCO}He would go on to become one of the highest-ranking enlisted ghouls in the NCR military.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cutty dies - Cocker becomes taskmaster NCO}他后来成为了NCR军队中级别最高的食尸鬼之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}Traumatized by Cocker's demise, Cutty became embittered and angry, carrying a singular hatred for the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}科克尔的死给了卡蒂精神上的创伤，卡蒂变得痛苦和愤怒，对军团怀有一种特殊的仇恨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}His superiors became worried when Cutty began sporting body parts and various trophies from dead Legionaries, prompting a psychological evaluation.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}当卡蒂开始炫耀死去的军团士兵的身体部位和各种战利品时，他的上级开始担心，于是进行了心理评估。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}Facing an imminent discharge, Cutty gathered all the weapons and ammunition he could carry, then crossed the Colorado in search of revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}面对即将到来的解雇，卡蒂收集了他能携带的所有武器和弹药，然后越过科罗拉多河去复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}He was listed as MIA, but from time to time mutilated Legion corpses would be found on the opposite river bank, with "Cocker" carved in their flesh.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}他被列为战斗失踪人员，但不时会在河对岸发现残缺的军团尸体，他们的肉上刻着“科克尔”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}Cutty was never again seen in NCR, but the legend of a murderous mutant who quietly butchered Legionaries would endure for years in Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}卡蒂再也没有出现在NCR中，但在亚利桑那州，关于一个凶残的变种人悄悄屠杀军团士兵的传说却经久不衰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Both die - many ghouls and mutants are inspired to enlist}True to each other as both soldiers and friends, Cocker and Cutty both fell defending each other and their comrades at FOB Omega.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Both die - many ghouls and mutants are inspired to enlist}作为士兵和朋友，科克尔和卡蒂忠于彼此，在欧米茄前线作战基地战役中为保卫对方和战友而牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Both die - many ghouls and mutants are inspired to enlist}NCR Command would immortalize the unlikely heroes in the form of recruiting pamphlets designed to appeal to ghouls and supermutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Both die - many ghouls and mutants are inspired to enlist}NCR指挥部将以招募小册子的形式使这些英雄不朽，旨在吸引食尸鬼和超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Both die - many ghouls and mutants are inspired to enlist}The surviving slaves, however, would venerate the pair by naming countless offspring Cocker or Cutty. Many took up the barber trade in their honor.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Both die - many ghouls and mutants are inspired to enlist}幸存下来的奴隶们很尊重这对搭档，给他们无数的后代起名叫科克尔或卡蒂，以示尊敬。许多人为了纪念他们而从事理发业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}The hundreds of slaves who had huddled in a nearby cave cheered aloud when the scale of the Legion's defeat became apparent.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}当军团溃败的规模变得明显时，数百名蜷缩在附近洞穴里的奴隶大声欢呼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}Their jubilation quickly turned to stunned reverence, however, when they set out to bury the fallen and pay their respects.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}然而，当他们开始埋葬阵亡将士并表达敬意时，他们的喜悦很快变成了震惊的崇敬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}Soon thereafter the slaves were integrated into NCR society, where most thrived. Some found simple work, while a few turned to banditry.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}此后不久，奴隶们融入了NCR社会，在那里大多数人生活得很好。一些人找到了简单的工作，还有一些人走上了土匪之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}Whatever their station, the slaves never forgot the garrison at FOB Omega who had sacrificed so much to ensure their right to life and liberty.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}无论他们的地位如何，奴隶们永远不会忘记欧米茄前线作战基地的驻军，他们为了保证他们的生命和自由的权利做出了巨大的牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}Every year the survivors would hold a memorial in their honor, thankful to be free from the fetters of slavery and the threat of crucifixion.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves survive, integrate into society, eternally grateful}每年，幸存者都会为他们举行纪念活动，感谢他们从奴役的枷锁和十字架的威胁中解放了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves fight}Though only a few slaves were able to assist in the defense of FOB Omega, their courage and sacrifice did not go unnoticed by NCR Command.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves fight}虽然只有少数奴隶能够协助保卫欧米茄前线作战基地，但他们的勇气和牺牲并没有被NCR指挥部忽视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves fight}Soon after the battle, a special unit consisting of former slaves was formed. It would become one of the most distinguished units in the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves fight}战争结束后不久，一支由前奴隶组成的特殊部队成立了。它将成为战争中最杰出的部队之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves fight}As for the rest of the slaves, they never forgot the garrison at FOB Omega who had sacrificed so much to ensure their right to life and liberty.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves fight}至于其他的奴隶，他们永远不会忘记欧米茄前线作战基地的守军，他们为保证他们的生命权和自由权作出了巨大的牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slaves fight}Every year the survivors would hold a memorial in their honor, thankful to be free from the fetters of slavery and the threat of crucifixion.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slaves fight}每年，幸存者都会为他们举行纪念活动，感谢他们从奴役的枷锁和十字架的威胁中解放了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Legion Ending}Due to Titus Atticus' single-minded obsession with exterminating rebellious slaves, most of the Legion's southern army was annihilated at FOB Omega.
ESP.TRADUIT: {军团结局}由于提图斯·阿提库斯一心一意地想要消灭反抗的奴隶，军团的大部分南方军队都在欧米茄前线作战基地被歼灭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Legion Ending}Though they could still mount reconnaissance missions and small raids, Legionaries would never again take the offensive south of Bullhead.
ESP.TRADUIT: {军团结局}尽管他们仍然可以执行侦察任务和小型突袭，但军团再也无力进攻布尔海德南部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Legion Ending}In turn, the NCR was free to divert much-needed resources and manpower to Hoover Dam, where the truly decisive battle would soon take place.
ESP.TRADUIT: {军团结局}反之，NCR可以自由地将急需的资源和人力转移到胡佛大坝，真正决定性的战斗很快就会在那里展开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - low casualties, unit commendation}The stand at FOB Omega would be heralded by the NCR as a historic victory and testament to the competence and fortitude of its soldiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 低伤亡，部队表彰}在欧米茄前线作战基地的战役将被NCR宣布为一个历史性的胜利，并证明其士兵的能力和坚韧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - low casualties, unit commendation}Though the garrison had sustained some casualties, it was negligible in proportion to the Legion's catastrophic loss of manpower.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 低伤亡，部队表彰}尽管卫戍部队遭受了一些伤亡，但与军团灾难性的人力损失相比，这是微不足道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - low casualties, unit commendation}NCR Command would heap medals and commendations on both individual soldiers and the garrison as a whole.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 低伤亡，部队表彰}NCR指挥部将把大量的奖章和奖状授予个别士兵和整个驻军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - low casualties, unit commendation}Nonetheless, the engagement would be overshadowed by the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, where the fate of all the Mojave Wasteland would be decided.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 低伤亡，部队表彰}尽管如此，这场战役却被胡佛大坝的第二次战役蒙上了一层阴影，这场战役将决定莫哈维废土的命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - high casualties - immortalized}After the battle, word spread through the NCR of how a tiny garrison had nearly perished in a heroic stand against a Legion army bent on massacre.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 高伤亡 - 不朽}战斗结束后，消息通过NCR传播，一个弱小的守备部队如何在英勇地对抗决心屠杀的军团时几乎全部牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - high casualties - immortalized}Against overwhelming, even suicidal odds, the men and women of FOB Omega performed their duty, most sacrificing their lives in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 高伤亡 - 不朽}面对压倒性的敌人，甚至是自杀式的抵抗，欧米茄前线作战基地的男男女女们履行了他们的职责，大多数人在这个过程中牺牲了自己的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - high casualties - immortalized}The stand at FOB Omega would become one of the most storied episodes in the history of the NCR. Many of the defenders would become household names.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 高伤亡 - 不朽}在欧米茄前线作战基地的战斗将成为NCR历史上最具传奇色彩的事件之一。许多守卫者的名字家喻户晓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {NCR - high casualties - immortalized}With the Legion assault on Hoover Dam looming, many used FOB Omega as a rallying cry, hoping to emulate the defenders' legendary courage.
ESP.TRADUIT: {NCR - 高伤亡 - 不朽}随着军团对胡佛水坝的攻击迫在眉睫，许多人将“欧米茄前线作战基地”作为战斗口号，希望效仿守卫者的传奇勇气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Male}By standing with the garrison of FOB Omega and safeguarding hundreds of helpless slaves, the Courier managed to exorcise some of the demons of Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: {男}通过与欧米茄前线作战基地的驻军站在一起，保护数百名无助的奴隶，邮差设法驱除了犹他州的一些邪念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Male}He understood the defining characteristic of a hero: sacrifice. The pain, loss, and misery he had endured had ensured life and liberty for others.
ESP.TRADUIT: {男}他理解英雄的定义特征：牺牲。他所忍受的痛苦、损失和苦难确保了他人的生命和自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Male}Taking solace in this fact, he walked with pride back to the Mojave Wasteland, his thoughts focused on the imminent battle at Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: {男}在这一事实的安慰下，他骄傲地走回莫哈维废土，他的思想集中在即将到来的胡佛水坝战役上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Female}By standing with the garrison of FOB Omega and safeguarding hundreds of helpless slaves, the Courier managed to exorcise some of the demons of Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: {女}通过与欧米茄前线作战基地的驻军站在一起，保护数百名无助的奴隶，邮差设法驱除了犹他州的一些邪念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Female}She understood the defining characteristic of a hero: sacrifice. The pain, loss, and misery she had endured had ensured life and liberty for others.
ESP.TRADUIT: {女}他理解英雄的定义特征：牺牲。他所忍受的痛苦、损失和苦难确保了他人的生命和自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Female}Taking solace in this fact, she walked with pride back to the Mojave Wasteland, her thoughts focused on the imminent battle at Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: {女}在这一事实的安慰下，他骄傲地走回莫哈维废土，他的思想集中在即将到来的胡佛水坝战役上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : James from Security [0300A3C0] (mod) Quest : ([0300A3BF]aaTBAEnding) Ending Slideshow EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready for the battle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好战斗了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking serious? I told you... motherfucker, I've been the one telling you about all this shit, I know what's coming!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真的吗?我告诉你...混蛋，是我告诉你这些的，我知道接下来会发生什么!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyPreBattl_0000E736_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been through worse... fucking be fine. Shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我经历过更糟糕的......他妈的没事的。该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Josey [03000DBB] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaJoseyVoiceType\aaTBAGener_aaJoseyPreBattl_0000E736_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready for the attack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好进攻了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion is gonna get fucked here. That's all that matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团会在这里遭殃的，这才是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ranger Watson [03000DBC] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if we can be ready for this kind of thing, but... we've got a job to do. From what the rangers are telling me, this is gonna get ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道我们能不能做好准备，但是...我们有工作要做。从游骑兵告诉我的情况来看，很糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But like they say... ours isn't to reason why, it's to do and die, and that's what we're gonna do, because we're soldiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但就像他们说的...我们不是去解释原因，而是去做，去死，这就是我们要做的，因为我们是士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worst part of something like this is when you survive and your friends don't, but we'll deal with that on the other side of this. Good luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种事最糟糕的是你活了下来而你的朋友却死了，但我们会在另一方面解决这个问题。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't tell the men this, but I'll tell you. It's something of a miracle that we're standing here, and... I think you were a big part of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会告诉他们，但我会告诉你。我们能站在这里真是奇迹，而且...我觉得你在其中起了很大作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, and for what's it worth, I'll do everything in my power to make sure you receive recognition for your actions today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，无论如何，我会尽我所能确保你今天的行为得到认可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After this... I can't imagine Hoover Dam is gonna be too hard for you. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之后...我不认为胡佛水坝对你来说会有难度了。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like we made it. That was quite a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们成功了，真是一场激烈的战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: INCOMPLETE
ESP.TRADUIT: 不完全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gonna give a speech?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要发表演讲吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sincerely, thank you. A lot of mercs, I mean "Contractors", would be out of here first sight of that Legion army. Won't forget it. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真诚地感谢你，很多雇佣兵，我是说“承包人”，一看到军团就会离开这里。我永远不会忘记，谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever happens, I'll be right there with you and your men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管发生什么，我都会陪在你和你的人身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sound like my dad. Glad I'll have that in my subconscious during this whole thing. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说话像我爸爸，很高兴整个过程中我的潜意识里都有这个。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How poetic. Now don't fuck up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多么富有诗意，别搞砸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that really depends on just how bad things are in your mind... but, uh, you're right. Focus on the job, probably make it through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这真的取决于你的想法有多糟糕...但，你是对的。专注于工作，也许能挺过这一关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lieutenant Hodges [03000DBD] (mod) Quest : ([03000DBF]aaTBAGenericDialogue) Generic Dialogue for TBA EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry. These sort of things are always worse in your mind than they are in reality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，这类事情在你脑海中总是比在现实中更糟糕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's the army treating you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在部队里过得怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, imagine that you're like, a puppy. Really happy... and then a bunch of ants start ripping your skin off and eating you alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，把你想象成一只小狗。很高兴......然后一群蚂蚁开始剥你的皮，把你活活吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyWhatUpTo_0000E73F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and it's fucking hot, and you get fed shit all the time. That pretty much sums it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这里太他妈热了，而且你总是吃屎。差不多就是这样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyWhatUpTo_0000E73F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't want to insult you, but that's a pretty fucking stupid question. I could have snowmen there. It was nice and cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不想侮辱你，但这是个很蠢的问题。我可以在那里堆雪人。天气很好，很冷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyWhatUpTo_0000E740_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People complain about cold... all you got to do is put a fucking jacket on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们抱怨寒冷......你只要他妈穿件外套就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyWhatUpTo_0000E740_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, a hundred fucking thousand degrees, you could be butt ass naked and you're still gonna feel like you're in the pits of hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，十万度的高温，就算你光着屁股你还是会觉得自己在地狱里!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyWhatUpTo_0000E740_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No fucking snowmen...I can't even build a fucking sand castle-man-person-thing! I fucking miss my snowmen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有他妈的雪人...我甚至连个沙堡都造不出来!我他妈想念我的雪人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyWhatUpTo_0000E740_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You miss Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想念霜山？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What have you been up to since you left Utah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你离开犹他州后都在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's basically been a lot of marching and waiting, and being treated like a piece of shit most of the time, yeah, that's basically what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上就是行军和等待，大多数时候被当成一坨屎，是的，基本上就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely! I really miss cutting hair. This is gonna be great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对的!我真的很怀念剪头发的日子，那太棒了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCuttyCutHair_0000E73C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a haircut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想理发。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long as you don't ask for a high and tight, you got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你不要求高腰紧身衣，就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a haircut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想理发。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You feeling all right about the battle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这场战斗还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! I'm just gonna face certain death for a bunch of hobos that probably hate and despise me as a supermutant, but fuck it, that's life, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然!我要为一群可能憎恨鄙视我这个超级变种人的流浪汉面对死亡，但管他的，这就是生活，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In all seriousness, I've been through worse. Remember, I was in the Master's fucking army... bunch of guys in skirts throwing spears... kiss my ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，我经历过更糟的。记得吗，我他妈在主教的军队里...一群穿着裙子扔长矛的家伙...吻我的屁股!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that? Sorry, I've got this ringing shit in my hear, I can't fucking hear anything. Goddamn, that was crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么?抱歉，我耳朵里响个不停，我什么都听不见。该死，太疯狂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, thanks for sticking it out with us. You know, I don't know if we'd have made it without you, so... really, thank you, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，谢谢你陪我们坚持到最后。我不知道没有你我们能不能撑过去，所以...真的，谢谢，还有......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever need a haircut, just look me up in some place where it's hot and shitty, and you'll find me there, most likely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想剪头发，就去一个又热又脏的地方找我，我很可能就在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess this is it. I'm heading back to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候了，我要回莫哈维去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta bury my friend now... then I'm gonna kill some fucking Legion. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在要埋葬我的朋友...那我就去杀一个军团。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cutty [030058FC] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess this is it. I'm heading back to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候了，我要回莫哈维去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready for this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess the best part about dying... is that I won't have to be in this fucking shithole next to Cutty anymore. So yes, I'm fucking ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想死亡最好的部分...就是我不用再和卡蒂待在这个破地方了。所以，是的，我他妈的准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheBetterAngels.esp\aaCuttyVoiceType\aaCCDialog_aaCockerPreBatt_0000E743_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I holding up okay? Well, I've got shrapnel in my ass... and I've been shot at, nearly had my head cut off...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还撑得住吗?我屁股里有弹片...我还中过枪差点被砍下脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now Cutty's farting again in the foxhole. So yes, I guess I'm A-fucking-okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在卡蒂又在散兵坑里放屁了。所以是的，我想我他妈还行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, just a little battle fatigue, as they say. Thank you for your help. You need anything, just look me up. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，就像他们说的，有点战争疲劳。谢谢你的帮助，需要什么尽管来找我。照顾好自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You holding up okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cutty's dead. Nothing more to say. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂死了，没什么好说的了。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Private Cocker [030058FB] (mod) Quest : ([03009D98]aaCCDialogue) Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You holding up okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ending Slideshow
ESP.TRADUIT: 结局幻灯片放映

ESP.ORIGINAL: Generic Dialogue for TBA
ESP.TRADUIT: TBA通用对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Better Angels
ESP.TRADUIT: 善良的天使

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depart for the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出发前往莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Say your goodbyes to any surviving defenders.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）向幸存的守卫者道别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take Ryan to his family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带瑞安去见他的家人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with James Stone about Ryan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和詹姆斯·斯通谈谈瑞恩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mortar Bombardment
ESP.TRADUIT: 迫击炮轰炸

ESP.ORIGINAL: Intro Message
ESP.TRADUIT: 介绍信息

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fates of NPC's
ESP.TRADUIT: NPC们的命运

ESP.ORIGINAL: To Do and Die
ESP.TRADUIT: 赴汤蹈火

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defend FOB Omega.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保卫欧米茄前线作战基地

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slay Titus Atticus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了提图斯·阿提库斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Ranger Josey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和游骑兵乔西谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cocker and Cutty's Dialogue
ESP.TRADUIT: 科克尔与卡蒂的对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Beginning and the End
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始与结束

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Ranger Josey about the mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和游骑兵乔西聊聊这个任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Ranger Josey when you're ready to depart for Rourke's Ravine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备出发去罗克溪谷时通知游骑兵乔西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with the garrison commander of FOB Omega.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟欧米茄前线作战基地的驻军指挥官谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Repair the medical bot.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)修复医疗机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Repair the Sentry Bot.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)修复哨兵机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Lt. Hodges that you repaired one of the robots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知霍奇斯中尉你修好了一个机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask Lt. Hodges about the next job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问问霍奇斯中尉下一份工作的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Ranger Josey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和游骑兵乔西谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Lt. Hodges about getting reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟霍奇斯中尉谈谈增援事宜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Convince Major Spears to send reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说服斯皮尔斯少校派遣援军。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Lt. Hodges that reinforcements are en route.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知霍奇斯中尉增援部队已经在路上了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Ranger Josey about recruiting the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟游骑兵乔西谈谈招募奴隶的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Ranger Josey when you're ready to make final preparations for battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你为最后战斗做好准备时通知游骑兵乔西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assist the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 协助奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help the slave in labor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助奴隶劳动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Ranger Josey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和游骑兵乔西谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wipe out the Cazadors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭猎蜂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Ranger Josey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和游骑兵乔西谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Ranger Josey that you've helped the slaves as much as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉游骑兵乔西你已经尽力帮助奴隶了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the missing supply caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到失踪的补给车队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the missing supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找回丢失的补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return the supplies to Lt. Hodges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把补给还给霍奇斯中尉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the cave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Rescue the slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)营救奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait for the courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Intro Slideshow
ESP.TRADUIT: 介绍幻灯片

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quick Draw
ESP.TRADUIT: 快速拔枪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watson's Quick Draw Ability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沃森的快速拔枪能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: First Aid
ESP.TRADUIT: 急救

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to the presence of a medical bot, the defenders of FOB Omega will regenerate HP.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于医疗机器人的出现，欧米茄前线作战基地的守卫者将恢复生命值。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You are on the verge of undertaking a lengthy journey to Rorke's Ravine. You will have limited access to proper ordinance and supplies, and you will not be able to leave until the mission is completed.
The Better Angels is recommended for veteran Couriers (Level 35+).
Are you prepared to leave the Mojave Wasteland?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你即将踏上前往罗克溪谷的漫长旅程。你获得军需品和给养的机会有限，在任务完成之前你不能离开。
善良的天使推荐给经验丰富的邮差(35级以上)。
你准备好离开莫哈维废土了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Better Angels
ESP.TRADUIT: 善良的天使

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time to prepare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的时间准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depart for Rorke's Ravine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往罗克溪谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skip the slideshow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳过幻灯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon after the last Cazador falls dead, you hear the echoes of desperate screams from a nearby cave. Perhaps you should investigate and determine if slaves are in danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在最后一只猎蜂死去后不久，你听到附近洞穴里绝望尖叫声的回声。也许你应该调查一下奴隶是否有危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This woman is in the throes of labor, and appears to be having difficulty delivering her baby. She is in extreme pain. (Medicine 55 or higher Required. Luck helps, too)
ESP.TRADUIT: 这位妇女正处于阵痛之中，似乎在分娩时遇到了困难，她极度痛苦。(医学55或更高要求，运气也有帮助)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. Leave her alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，别管她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use your medical expertise to assist her with delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你的医学知识帮助她分娩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust in your luck and remember that you've seen this done many times... with Brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信你的运气，记住你已经见过很多次分娩了......婆罗门的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do your best to talk the slave through the delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽你最大的努力和奴隶谈话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You safely delivered the baby. The mother will recover as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你安全的接生了孩子，母亲也会康复。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You safely delivered the baby, but the mother died in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你安全的接生了孩子，但母亲在分娩过程中去世了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You are poised to leave Rorke's Ravine and return to the Mojave Wasteland. Once you depart, you will be unable to return.
Are you sure you want to continue?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你准备好离开罗克溪谷回到莫哈维废土。你一旦离开，就不能再回来了。
你确定要继续吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time to prepare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的时间准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skip the slideshow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳过幻灯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After looking over the damaged robot, you realize it will take considerable time and skill to return it to working order. (Requires a Repair skill of 65 or Science skill of 75. Luck helps, too.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 在检查了损坏的机器人后，你意识到它将需要相当长的时间和技术才能恢复工作。(需要65的修理或75的科学技能，运气也有帮助。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Derelict Medical Bot
ESP.TRADUIT: 废弃的医疗机器人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the robot alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管这个机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Repair) Repair the robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: (修理)修理机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Science) Repair the robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: (科学)修理机器人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust in your luck and repeatedly kick the robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信你的运气，反复踢机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After looking over the damaged robot, you realize it will take considerable time and skill to return it to working order. (Requires a Repair skill of 65 or Science skill of 75. Luck helps, too.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 在检查了损坏的机器人后，你意识到它将需要相当长的时间和技术才能恢复工作。(需要65的修理或75的科学技能，运气也有帮助。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Derelict Sentry Bot
ESP.TRADUIT: 废弃的哨兵机器人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the robot alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管这个机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Repair) Repair the robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: (修理)修理机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Science) Repair the robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: (科学)修理机器人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust in your luck and repeatedly kick the robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信你的运气，反复踢机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You reset the circuitry inside the robot. It should behave normally now. With access to proper first aid, the troopers defending FOB Omega will regenerate hp during combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你重置了机器人内部的电路，现在它应该能正常运行了。通过适当的急救，守卫欧米茄前线作战基地的士兵将在战斗中恢复生命值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reinforcements have arrived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 援军已抵达。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Deathclaw Matriarch and her young have been drawn to the pungent stench of blood left by the caravan ambush. She gently exhorts her brood to feast on the corpses so that they may grow strong and fully enjoy the role of apex predator. It is a touching display of maternal affection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一只死亡爪母兽和她的孩子们被商队伏击留下的刺鼻的血腥恶臭所吸引。她温柔地劝诫她的孩子们以尸体为食，这样他们就可以茁壮成长，充分享受顶级掠食者的角色，这是一种感人的母爱表露。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You reset the circuitry inside the robot. It should behave normally now. It will serve as a formidable addition to the base defenses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你重置了机器人内部的电路，现在它应该能正常运行了。它将作为基地防御的强大补充。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In her death throes, the Deathclaw Matriarch unleashes a deafening roar of despair. Her mate will surely come to investigate at any moment...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在垂死挣扎中，死亡爪母兽发出了震耳欲聋的绝望咆哮。她的伴侣一定会随时来调查......

ESP.ORIGINAL: The legionaries have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into his wrists. He's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团已把俘虏绑起来运走。绳子扎进了他的手腕，他显然受到了虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to his fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他自生自灭吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解开他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The legionaries have bound the captive for transportation. The ropes are digging into her wrists. She's obviously suffered from their abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团已把俘虏绑起来运走。绳子扎进了她的手腕，她显然受到了虐待。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the captive to her fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让她自生自灭吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解开她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through detailed instruction, you have improved the explosives skill of all the troopers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过详细的指导，你提高了所有士兵的爆破技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through detailed instruction, you have improved the guns skill of all the troopers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过详细的指导，你提高了所有士兵的枪械技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
As the Second Battle of Hoover Dam looms large, rumors abound that a great slave revolt has been quelled in Arizona, prompting hordes of runaway slaves to flee for the Colorado River, with a sizable Legion army in pursuit. Many speculate about the implications of these events for the war between NCR and Caesar's Legion.
Still scarred from the events of Frosthill, the Courier now wonders if one last adventure awaits before the conclusive battle for the Mojave Wasteland. The Better Angels is recommended for veteran Couriers (Levels 35+).
ESP.TRADUIT:
随着第二次胡佛水坝战役的临近，有传言称亚利桑那州的奴隶起义已经平息，大批逃跑的奴隶逃往科罗拉多河，并有一支庞大的军团在追捕。许多人猜测这些事件对NCR和凯撒军团之间的战争的影响。
霜山事件留下了伤疤，邮差现在想知道在莫哈维废土决战之前是否还要进行最后一次冒险。善良的天使推荐给经验丰富的邮差(35级以上)。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Better Angels
ESP.TRADUIT: 善良的天使

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through detailed instruction, you have improved the melee skill of all the troopers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过详细的指导，你提高了所有士兵的近战技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This woman appears to be severely injured. Swelling around her face and neck is interfering with her breathing. Are you sure to want to treat her? (Medicine 25 or higher Required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个女人似乎受了重伤。她的脸和脖子周围的肿胀干扰了她的呼吸，你确定要治疗她吗?(医疗技能25或以上)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. Leave her alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，别管她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Treat the patient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治疗病人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After carefully considering treatment options, you realize the patient is merely having a strong allergic reaction. By cleaning all wounds of Cazador venom, and administering a steroid compound, you reduce the swelling and the patient's breathing returns to normal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在仔细考虑治疗方案后，你意识到病人只是有一个强烈的过敏反应。只需要清洗所有伤口的猎蜂毒液，并使用类固醇化合物，你就能减轻肿胀，让病人的呼吸恢复正常。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rangers Josey and Watson have crossed the Colorado River to conduct a reconnaissance mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵乔西和沃森已经越过科罗拉多河执行侦察任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You are about to begin final preparations for the upcoming battle. It will likely be a dangerous, drawn-out engagement.
Are you sure you want to proceed?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你即将开始为即将到来的战斗做最后的准备。这可能是一场危险的、旷日持久的战争。
你确定要继续吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Final Preparations
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的准备

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more time to prepare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的时间准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skip the battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳过战斗。

ESP.TRADUIT: 胡克通道

ESP.TRADUIT: 斯通家族餐厅

ESP.TRADUIT: 终局
